analyzed: rudatyaḥ uccais dayita aṅghri paṅkajam siñcantyaḥ asraiḥ kuca kuṅkuma aruṇaiḥ

original: BhP_07.02.032/2 visrastakeśābharaṇāḥ śucaṃ nṛṇāṃ sṛjantya ākrandanayā vilepire
analyzed: visrasta keśa ābharaṇāḥ śucam nṛṇām sṛjantyaḥ ākrandanayā vilepire

original: BhP_07.02.033/1 aho vidhātrākaruṇena naḥ prabho bhavān praṇīto dṛgagocarāṃ daśām
analyzed: aho vidhātrā akaruṇena naḥ prabho bhavān praṇītaḥ dṛś agocarām daśām

original: BhP_07.02.033/2 uśīnarāṇāmasi vṛttidaḥ purā kṛto 'dhunā yena śucāṃ vivardhanaḥ
analyzed: uśīnarāṇām asi vṛtti daḥ purā kṛtaḥ dhunā yena śucām vivardhanaḥ

original: BhP_07.02.034/1 tvayā kṛtajñena vayaṃ mahīpate kathaṃ vinā syāma suhṛttamena te
analyzed: tvayā kṛtajñena vayam mahīpate katham vinā syāma suhṛttamena te

original: BhP_07.02.034/2 tatrānuyānaṃ tava vīra pādayoḥ śuśrūṣatīnāṃ diśa yatra yāsyasi
analyzed: tatra anuyānam tava vīra pādayoḥ śuśrūṣatīnām diśaḥ yatra yāsyasi

original: BhP_07.02.035/1 evaṃ vilapatīnāṃ vai parigṛhya mṛtaṃ patim
analyzed: evam vilapatīnām vai parigṛhya mṛtam patim
an icchatīnām nirhāram arkaḥ stam sat nyavartata
tatra ha preta bandhūnām āśrutya paridevitam

original: BhP_07.02.036/2 āha tān bālako bhūtvā yamaḥ svayamupāgataḥ
analyzed: āha tān bālakaḥ bhūtvā yamaḥ svayam upāgataḥ
śrī yamaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_07.02.037/1 aho amīṣāṃ vayasādhikānāṃ vipaśyatāṃ lokavidhiṃ vimohaḥ
analyzed: aho amīṣām vayasā adhikānām vipaśyatām loka vidhim vimohaḥ

original: BhP_07.02.037/2 yatrāgatastatra gataṃ manuṣyaṃ svayaṃ sadharmā api śocantyapārtham
analyzed: yatra āgataḥ tatra gatam manuṣyam svayam sadharmāḥ api śocanti apārtham

original: BhP_07.02.038/1 aho vayaṃ dhanyatamā yadatra tyaktāḥ pitṛbhyāṃ na vicintayāmaḥ
analyzed: aho vayam dhanyatamāḥ yat atra tyaktāḥ pitṛbhyām na vicintayāmaḥ

original: BhP_07.02.038/2 abhakṣyamāṇā abalā vṛkādibhiḥ sa rakṣitā rakṣati yo hi garbhe
analyzed: a bhakṣyamāṇāḥ abalāḥ vṛka ādibhiḥ sa rakṣitā rakṣati yaḥ hi garbhe

original: BhP_07.02.039/1 ya icchayeśaḥ sṛjatīdamavyayo ya eva rakṣatyavalumpate ca yaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ icchayā īśaḥ sṛjati idam avyayaḥ yaḥ eva rakṣati avalumpate ca yaḥ

original: BhP_07.02.039/2 tasyābalāḥ krīḍanamāhurīśituś carācaraṃ nigrahasaṅgrahe prabhuḥ
analyzed: tasya abalāḥ krīḍanam āhuḥ īśituḥ carācaram nigraha saṅgrahe prabhuḥ

original: BhP_07.02.040/1 pathi cyutaṃ tiṣṭhati diṣṭarakṣitaṃ gṛhe sthitaṃ tadvihataṃ vinaśyati
analyzed: pathi cyutam tiṣṭhati diṣṭa rakṣitam gṛhe sthitam tat vihatam vinaśyati

original: BhP_07.02.040/2 jīvatyanātho 'pi tadīkṣito vane gṛhe 'bhigupto 'sya hato na jīvati
analyzed: jīvati anāthaḥ pi tad īkṣitaḥ vane gṛhe sya hataḥ na jīvati

original: BhP_07.02.041/1 bhūtāni taistairnijayonikarmabhir bhavanti kāle na bhavanti sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: bhūtāni taiḥ taiḥ nija yoni karmabhiḥ bhavanti kāle na bhavanti sarvaśas

original: BhP_07.02.041/2 na tatra hātmā prakṛtāvapi sthitas tasyā guṇairanyatamo hi badhyate
analyzed: na tatra ha ātmā prakṛtau api sthitaḥ tasyāḥ guṇaiḥ anyatamaḥ hi badhyate

original: BhP_07.02.042/1 idaṃ śarīraṃ puruṣasya mohajaṃ yathā pṛthag bhautikamīyate gṛham
analyzed: idam śarīram puruṣasya moha jam yathā pṛthak bhautikam īyate gṛham

original: BhP_07.02.042/2 yathaudakaiḥ pārthivataijasairjanaḥ kālena jāto vikṛto vinaśyati
analyzed: yathā audakaiḥ pārthiva taijasaiḥ janaḥ kālena jātaḥ vikṛtaḥ vinaśyati

original: BhP_07.02.043/1 yathānalo dāruṣu bhinna īyate yathānilo dehagataḥ pṛthak sthitaḥ
analyzed: yathā analaḥ dāruṣu bhinnaḥ īyate yathā anilaḥ deha gataḥ pṛthak sthitaḥ

original: BhP_07.02.043/2 yathā nabhaḥ sarvagataṃ na sajjate tathā pumān sarvaguṇāśrayaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: yathā nabhaḥ sarva gatam na sajjate tathā pumān sarva guṇa āśrayaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_07.02.044/1 suyajño nanvayaṃ śete mūḍhā yamanuśocatha
analyzed: su yajñaḥ nanu ayam śete mūḍhāḥ yam anuśocatha

original: BhP_07.02.044/2 yaḥ śrotā yo 'nuvakteha sa na dṛśyeta karhicit
analyzed: yaḥ śrotā yaḥ nuvaktā iha sa na dṛśyeta karhicit

original: BhP_07.02.045/1 na śrotā nānuvaktāyaṃ mukhyo 'pyatra mahān asuḥ
analyzed: na śrotā na anuvaktā ayam mukhyaḥ u pi atra mahān asuḥ

original: BhP_07.02.045/2 yastvihendriyavān ātmā sa cānyaḥ prāṇadehayoḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu iha indriyavān ātmā sa ca anyaḥ prāṇa dehayoḥ
bhūta indriya manaḥ liṅgān dehān uccāvacān vibhuḥ

original: BhP_07.02.046/2 bhajatyutsṛjati hyanyastac cāpi svena tejasā
analyzed: bhajati utsṛjati hi anyaḥ tat ca api svena tejasā

original: BhP_07.02.047/1 yāval liṅgānvito hyātmā tāvat karmanibandhanam
analyzed: yāvat liṅga anvitaḥ hi ātmā tāvat karma nibandhanam
tatas viparyayaḥ kleśaḥ māyā yogaḥ nuvartate
vitatha abhiniveśaḥ yam yad guṇeṣu artha dṛś vacaḥ

original: BhP_07.02.048/2 yathā manorathaḥ svapnaḥ sarvamaindriyakaṃ mṛṣā
analyzed: yathā manorathaḥ svapnaḥ sarvam aindriyakam mṛṣā

original: BhP_07.02.049/1 atha nityamanityaṃ vā neha śocanti tadvidaḥ
analyzed: atha nityam anityam vā na iha śocanti tad vidaḥ

original: BhP_07.02.049/2 nānyathā śakyate kartuṃ svabhāvaḥ śocatāmiti
analyzed: na anyathā śakyate kartum svabhāvaḥ śocatām iti

original: BhP_07.02.050/1 lubdhako vipine kaścit pakṣiṇāṃ nirmito 'ntakaḥ
analyzed: lubdhakaḥ vipine kaścid pakṣiṇām nirmitaḥ ntakaḥ

original: BhP_07.02.050/2 vitatya jālaṃ vidadhe tatra tatra pralobhayan
analyzed: vitatya jālam vidadhe tatra tatra pralobhayan
kuliṅga mithunam tatra vicarat samadṛśyata

original: BhP_07.02.051/2 tayoḥ kuliṅgī sahasā lubdhakena pralobhitā
analyzed: tayoḥ kuliṅgī sahasā lubdhakena pralobhitā
āsajjata sicaḥ tantryām mahiṣyaḥ kāla yantritā
kuliṅgaḥ tām tathā āpannām nirīkṣya bhṛśa duḥkhitaḥ
snehāt akalpaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ kṛpaṇām paryadevayat

original: BhP_07.02.053/1 aho akaruṇo devaḥ striyākaruṇayā vibhuḥ
analyzed: aho akaruṇaḥ devaḥ striyā akaruṇayā vibhuḥ

original: BhP_07.02.053/2 kṛpaṇaṃ māmanuśocantyā dīnayā kiṃ kariṣyati
analyzed: kṛpaṇam mām anuśocantyā dīnayā kim kariṣyati

original: BhP_07.02.054/1 kāmaṃ nayatu māṃ devaḥ kimardhenātmano hi me
analyzed: kāmam nayatu mām devaḥ kim ardhena ātmanaḥ hi me
dīnena jīvatā duḥkham anena vidhura āyuṣā
katham tu ajāta pakṣān tān mātṛ hīnān bibharmi aham

original: BhP_07.02.055/2 mandabhāgyāḥ pratīkṣante nīḍe me mātaraṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: mandabhāgyāḥ pratīkṣante nīḍe me mātaram prajāḥ
evam kuliṅgam vilapantam ārāt priyā viyoga āturam aśru kaṇṭham

original: BhP_07.02.056/2 sa eva taṃ śākunikaḥ śareṇa vivyādha kālaprahito vilīnaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva tam śākunikaḥ śareṇa vivyādha kāla prahitaḥ vilīnaḥ
evam yūyam apaśyantyaḥ ātma apāyam abuddhayaḥ

original: BhP_07.02.057/2 nainaṃ prāpsyatha śocantyaḥ patiṃ varṣaśatairapi
analyzed: na enam prāpsyatha śocantyaḥ patim varṣa śataiḥ api
śrī hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_07.02.058/1 bāla evaṃ pravadati sarve vismitacetasaḥ
analyzed: bālaḥ evam pravadati sarve vismita cetasaḥ
jñātayaḥ menire sarvam anityam ayathā utthitam
yamaḥ etat upākhyāya tatra eva antaradhīyata

original: BhP_07.02.059/2 jñātayo hi suyajñasya cakruryat sāmparāyikam
analyzed: jñātayaḥ hi suyajñasya cakruḥ yat sāmparāyikam

original: BhP_07.02.060/1 ataḥ śocata mā yūyaṃ paraṃ cātmānameva vā
analyzed: atas śocata mā yūyam param ca ātmānam eva vā

original: BhP_07.02.060/2 ka ātmā kaḥ paro vātra svīyaḥ pārakya eva vā
analyzed: kaḥ ātmā kaḥ paraḥ vā atra svīyaḥ pārakyaḥ eva vā
sva para abhiniveśena vinā ajñānena dehinām
uvāca
iti daitya pateḥ vākyam ditiḥ ākarṇya sa snuṣā

original: BhP_07.02.061/2 putraśokaṃ kṣaṇāt tyaktvā tattve cittamadhārayat
analyzed: putra śokam kṣaṇāt tyaktvā tattve cittam adhārayat
uvāca
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ rājan ajeyam ajara amaram
ātmānam apratidvandvam eka rājam vyadhitsata

original: BhP_07.03.002/1 sa tepe mandaradroṇyāṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam
analyzed: sa tepe mandara droṇyām tapaḥ parama dāruṇam
ūrdhva bāhuḥ nabhaḥ dṛṣṭiḥ pādāṅguṣṭha āśrita avaniḥ
jaṭā dīdhitibhiḥ reje saṃvarta arkaḥ iva aṃśubhiḥ
tasmin tapaḥ tapyamāne devāḥ sthānāni bhejire
tasya mūrdhnaḥ samudbhūtaḥ sa dhūmaḥ gniḥ tapaḥ mayaḥ

original: BhP_07.03.004/2 tīryag ūrdhvamadho lokān prātapadviṣvag īritaḥ
analyzed: tīryak ūrdhvam adhas lokān īritaḥ
cukṣubhuḥ nadī udanvantaḥ sa dvīpa adriḥ cacāla bhūḥ

original: BhP_07.03.005/2 nipetuḥ sagrahāstārā jajvaluśca diśo daśa
analyzed: nipetuḥ sa grahāḥ tārāḥ jajvaluḥ ca diśaḥ daśa

original: BhP_07.03.006/1 tena taptā divaṃ tyaktvā brahmalokaṃ yayuḥ surāḥ
analyzed: tena taptāḥ divam tyaktvā brahma lokam yayuḥ surāḥ
dhātre vijñāpayāmāsuḥ devadeva jagatpate

original: BhP_07.03.007/1 daityendratapasā taptā divi sthātuṃ na śaknumaḥ
analyzed: daitya indra tapasā taptāḥ divi sthātum na śaknumaḥ

original: BhP_07.03.007/2 tasya copaśamaṃ bhūman vidhehi yadi manyase
analyzed: tasya ca upaśamam bhūman vidhehi yadi manyase

original: BhP_07.03.007/3 lokā na yāvan naṅkṣyanti balihārāstavābhibhūḥ
analyzed: lokāḥ na yāvat naṅkṣyanti bali hārāḥ tava abhibhūḥ

original: BhP_07.03.008/1 tasyāyaṃ kila saṅkalpaścarato duścaraṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: tasya ayam kila saṅkalpaḥ carataḥ duścaram tapaḥ

original: BhP_07.03.008/2 śrūyatāṃ kiṃ na viditastavāthāpi niveditam
analyzed: śrūyatām kim na viditaḥ tava atha api niveditam
sṛṣṭvā carācaram idam tapaḥ yoga samādhinā
adhyāste sarva dhiṣṇyebhyaḥ parameṣṭhī nija āsanam
tat aham vardhamānena tapaḥ yoga samādhinā
kāla ātmanoḥ ca nitya tvāt sādhayiṣye tathā ātmanaḥ
anyathā idam vidhāsye pūrvam ojasā
kim anyaiḥ kāla nirdhūtaiḥ kalpa ante vaiṣṇava ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_07.03.012/1 iti śuśruma nirbandhaṃ tapaḥ paramamāsthitaḥ
analyzed: iti śuśruma nirbandham tapaḥ paramam āsthitaḥ
vidhatsva anantaram yuktam svayam tribhuvana īśvara
tava āsanam dvija gavām pārameṣṭhyam jagatpate

original: BhP_07.03.013/2 bhavāya śreyase bhūtyai kṣemāya vijayāya ca
analyzed: bhavāya śreyase bhūtyai kṣemāya vijayāya ca
iti vijñāpitaḥ devaiḥ bhagavān ātmabhūḥ nṛpa
paritas bhṛgu dakṣa ādyaiḥ yayau daitya īśvara āśramam
na dadarśa praticchannam valmīka tṛṇa kīcakaiḥ
pipīlikābhiḥ ācīrṇam medaḥ tvac māṃsa śoṇitam

original: BhP_07.03.016/1 tapantaṃ tapasā lokān yathābhrāpihitaṃ ravim
analyzed: tapantam tapasā lokān yathā abhra apihitam ravim

original: BhP_07.03.016/2 vilakṣya vismitaḥ prāha hasaṃstaṃ haṃsavāhanaḥ
analyzed: vilakṣya vismitaḥ prāha hasan tam haṃsavāhanaḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_07.03.017/1 uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te tapaḥsiddho 'si kāśyapa
analyzed: uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha bhadram te tapaḥ siddhaḥ si kāśyapa
vara daḥ ham anuprāptaḥ vriyatām īpsitaḥ varaḥ
adrākṣam aham etam te hṛd sāram mahat adbhutam
daṃśa bhakṣita dehasya prāṇāḥ hi asthiṣu śerate
na etat pūrva ṛṣayaḥ cakruḥ na kariṣyanti ca apare

original: BhP_07.03.019/2 niramburdhārayet prāṇān ko vai divyasamāḥ śatam
analyzed: nirambuḥ dhārayet prāṇān kaḥ vai divya samāḥ śatam
vyavasāyena te nena duṣkareṇa manasvinām
tapaḥ niṣṭhena bhavatā ajitaḥ ham diti nandana
tatas te āśiṣaḥ sarvāḥ dadāmi asura puṅgava

original: BhP_07.03.021/2 martasya te hyamartasya darśanaṃ nāphalaṃ mama
analyzed: martasya te hi amartasya darśanam na aphalam mama
uvāca
iti uktvā ādibhavaḥ devaḥ bhakṣita aṅgam pipīlikaiḥ
kamaṇḍalu jalena aukṣat divyena amogha rādhasā
sa tat kīcaka valmīkāt sahaḥ ojaḥ bala anvitaḥ
sarva avayava sampannaḥ vajra saṃhananaḥ yuvā
utthitaḥ tapta hema ābhaḥ vibhāvasuḥ iva edhasaḥ
sa nirīkṣya ambare devam haṃsa vāham upasthitam
nanāma śirasā bhūmau tad darśana mahā utsavaḥ

original: BhP_07.03.025/1 utthāya prāñjaliḥ prahva īkṣamāṇo dṛśā vibhum
analyzed: utthāya prāñjaliḥ prahvaḥ īkṣamāṇaḥ dṛśā vibhum
harṣa aśru pulaka udbhedaḥ girā gadgadayā agṛṇāt
śrī hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca
kalpa ante kāla sṛṣṭena yaḥ ndhena tamasā āvṛtam
abhivyanak jagat idam svayan jyotiḥ sva rociṣā

original: BhP_07.03.027/1 ātmanā trivṛtā cedaṃ sṛjatyavati lumpati
analyzed: ātmanā trivṛtā ca idam sṛjati avati lumpati
rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ dhāmne parāya mahate namaḥ
namaḥ ādyāya bījāya jñāna vijñāna mūrtaye
prāṇa indriya manaḥ buddhi vikāraiḥ vyaktim īyuṣe

original: BhP_07.03.029/1 tvamīśiṣe jagatastasthuṣaśca prāṇena mukhyena patiḥ prajānām
analyzed: tvam īśiṣe jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca prāṇena mukhyena patiḥ prajānām
cittasya patiḥ mahān bhūta guṇa āśaya īśaḥ

original: BhP_07.03.030/1 tvaṃ saptatantūn vitanoṣi tanvā trayyā caturhotrakavidyayā ca
analyzed: tvam sapta tantūn vitanoṣi tanvā trayyā caturhotraka vidyayā ca
tvam ekaḥ ātmā ātmavatām anādiḥ ananta pāraḥ kaviḥ antarātmā

original: BhP_07.03.031/1 tvameva kālo 'nimiṣo janānām āyurlavādyavayavaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi
analyzed: tvam eva kālaḥ nimiṣaḥ janānām āyuḥ lava ādi avayavaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi

original: BhP_07.03.031/2 kūṭastha ātmā parameṣṭhyajo mahāṃs tvaṃ jīvalokasya ca jīva ātmā
analyzed: kūṭasthaḥ ātmā parameṣṭhī ajaḥ mahān tvam jīva lokasya ca jīvaḥ ātmā

original: BhP_07.03.032/1 tvattaḥ paraṃ nāparamapyanejad ejac ca kiñcidvyatiriktamasti
analyzed: tvattaḥ param na aparam api anejat ejat ca kiñcid vyatiriktam asti

original: BhP_07.03.032/2 vidyāḥ kalāste tanavaśca sarvā hiraṇyagarbho 'si bṛhat tripṛṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: vidyāḥ kalāḥ te tanavaḥ ca sarvāḥ hiraṇya garbhaḥ si bṛhat tri pṛṣṭhaḥ

original: BhP_07.03.033/1 vyaktaṃ vibho sthūlamidaṃ śarīraṃ yenendriyaprāṇamanoguṇāṃstvam
analyzed: vyaktam vibho sthūlam idam śarīram yena indriya prāṇa manaḥ guṇān tvam

original: BhP_07.03.033/2 bhuṅkṣe sthito dhāmani pārameṣṭhye avyakta ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ
analyzed: bhuṅkṣe sthitaḥ dhāmani pārameṣṭhye avyakte ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ
ananta avyakta rūpeṇa yena idam akhilam tatam
cit acit śakti yuktāya tasmai bhagavate namaḥ

original: BhP_07.03.035/1 yadi dāsyasyabhimatān varān me varadottama
analyzed: yadi dāsyasi abhimatān varān me vara da uttama

original: BhP_07.03.035/2 bhūtebhyastvadvisṛṣṭebhyo mṛtyurmā bhūn mama prabho
analyzed: bhūtebhyaḥ tvad visṛṣṭebhyaḥ mṛtyuḥ mā bhūt mama prabho
na antar bahis divā naktam anyasmāt api ca āyudhaiḥ

original: BhP_07.03.036/2 na bhūmau nāmbare mṛtyurna narairna mṛgairapi
analyzed: na bhūmau nā ambare mṛtyuḥ na naraiḥ na mṛgaiḥ api
vyasubhiḥ vāsumadbhiḥ vā sura asura mahā uragaiḥ

original: BhP_07.03.037/2 apratidvandvatāṃ yuddhe aikapatyaṃ ca dehinām
analyzed: apratidvandva tām yuddhe aikapatyam ca dehinām
sarveṣām lokapālānām mahimānam yathā ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_07.03.038/2 tapoyogaprabhāvāṇāṃ yan na riṣyati karhicit
analyzed: tapaḥ yoga prabhāvāṇām yat na riṣyati karhicit
uvāca
evam vṛtaḥ śatadhṛtiḥ hiraṇyakaśipoḥ atha

original: BhP_07.04.001/2 prādāt tattapasā prīto varāṃstasya sudurlabhān
analyzed: prādāt tad tapasā prītaḥ varān tasya su durlabhān

paraḥ pi apatyam hita kṛt yathā auṣadham sva deha jaḥ pi āmaya vat sutaḥ hitaḥ

original: BhP_07.05.037/2 chindyāt tadaṅgaṃ yadutātmano 'hitaṃ śeṣaṃ sukhaṃ jīvati yadvivarjanāt
analyzed: chindyāt tad aṅgam yat uta ātmanaḥ hitam śeṣam sukham jīvati yad vivarjanāt
sarvaiḥ upāyaiḥ hantavyaḥ sambhoja śayana āsanaiḥ
suhṛd liṅga dharaḥ śatruḥ muneḥ duṣṭam iva indriyam

original: BhP_07.05.039/1 nairṛtāste samādiṣṭā bhartrā vai śūlapāṇayaḥ
analyzed: nairṛtāḥ te samādiṣṭāḥ bhartrā vai śūla pāṇayaḥ
tigma daṃṣṭra karāla āsyāḥ tāmra śmaśru śiroruhāḥ

original: BhP_07.05.040/1 nadanto bhairavaṃ nādaṃ chindhi bhindhīti vādinaḥ
analyzed: nadantaḥ bhairavam nādam chindhi bhindhi iti vādinaḥ

original: BhP_07.05.040/2 āsīnaṃ cāhanan śūlaiḥ prahrādaṃ sarvamarmasu
analyzed: āsīnam ca ahanan śūlaiḥ prahrādam sarva marmasu
pare brahmaṇi anirdeśye bhagavati akhilātmani
yukta ātmani aphalāḥ āsanna puṇyasya iva satkriyāḥ
prayāse pahate tasmin daitya indraḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ
cakāra tad vadha upāyān nirbandhena yudhiṣṭhira
diggajaiḥ dandaśūka indraiḥ abhicāra avapātanaiḥ
māyābhiḥ sannirodhaiḥ ca gara dānaiḥ abhojanaiḥ
hima vāyu agni salilaiḥ parvata ākramaṇaiḥ api

original: BhP_07.05.044/2 na śaśāka yadā hantumapāpamasuraḥ sutam
analyzed: na śaśāka yadā hantum apāpam asuraḥ sutam
cintām dīrghatamām prāptaḥ tat kartum na abhyapadyata

original: BhP_07.05.045/1 eṣa me bahvasādhūkto vadhopāyāśca nirmitāḥ
analyzed: eṣa me bahu asādhu uktaḥ vadha upāyāḥ ca nirmitāḥ
taiḥ taiḥ drohaiḥ asat dharmaiḥ muktaḥ svena eva tejasā
vartamānaḥ vidūre vai bālaḥ pi a jaḍa dhīḥ ayam

original: BhP_07.05.046/2 na vismarati me 'nāryaṃ śunaḥ śepa iva prabhuḥ
analyzed: na vismarati me nāryam śunaḥ śepaḥ iva prabhuḥ

original: BhP_07.05.047/2 nūnametadvirodhena mṛtyurme bhavitā na vā
analyzed: nūnam etad virodhena mṛtyuḥ me bhavitā na vā
iti tad cintayā kiñcid mlāna śriyam adhomukham
śaṇḍāmarkau auśanasau vivikte iti ha ūcatuḥ

original: BhP_07.05.049/1 jitaṃ tvayaikena jagattrayaṃ bhruvor vijṛmbhaṇatrastasamastadhiṣṇyapam
analyzed: jitam tvayā ekena jagattrayam bhruvoḥ vijṛmbhaṇa trasta samasta dhiṣṇyapam

original: BhP_07.05.049/2 na tasya cintyaṃ tava nātha cakṣvahe na vai śiśūnāṃ guṇadoṣayoḥ padam
analyzed: na tasya cintyam tava nātha cakṣvahe na vai śiśūnām guṇa doṣayoḥ padam

original: BhP_07.05.050/1 imaṃ tu pāśairvaruṇasya baddhvā nidhehi bhīto na palāyate yathā
analyzed: imam tu pāśaiḥ varuṇasya baddhvā nidhehi bhītaḥ na palāyate yathā

original: BhP_07.05.050/2 buddhiśca puṃso vayasāryasevayā yāvadgururbhārgava āgamiṣyati
analyzed: buddhiḥ ca puṃsaḥ vayasā ārya sevayā yāvat guruḥ bhārgavaḥ āgamiṣyati
tathā iti guru putra uktam anujñāya idam abravīt

original: BhP_07.05.051/2 dharmo hyasyopadeṣṭavyo rājñāṃ yo gṛhamedhinām
analyzed: dharmaḥ hi asya upadeṣṭavyaḥ rājñām yaḥ gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_07.05.052/1 dharmamarthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca nitarāṃ cānupūrvaśaḥ
analyzed: dharmam artham ca kāmam ca nitarām ca anupūrvaśas
prahrādāya ūcatuḥ rājan praśrita avanatāya ca
yathā trivargam gurubhiḥ ātmane upaśikṣitam

original: BhP_07.05.053/2 na sādhu mene tacchikṣāṃ dvandvārāmopavarṇitām
analyzed: na sādhu mene tad śikṣām dvandva ārāma upavarṇitām
yat ācāryaḥ parāvṛttaḥ gṛhamedhīya karmasu
vayasyaiḥ bālakaiḥ tatra saḥ upahūtaḥ kṛtakṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_07.05.055/1 atha tān ślakṣṇayā vācā pratyāhūya mahābudhaḥ
analyzed: atha tān ślakṣṇayā vācā pratyāhūya mahā budhaḥ
uvāca vidvān tad niṣṭhām kṛpayā prahasan iva

original: BhP_07.05.056/1 te tu tadgauravāt sarve tyaktakrīḍāparicchadāḥ
analyzed: te tu tad gauravāt sarve tyakta krīḍā paricchadāḥ
bālāḥ a dūṣita dhiyaḥ dvandva ārāma īrita īhitaiḥ
paryupāsata rāja indra tad nyasta hṛdaya īkṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_07.05.057/2 tān āha karuṇo maitro mahābhāgavato 'suraḥ
analyzed: tān āha karuṇaḥ maitraḥ suraḥ
śrī prahrādaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_07.06.001/1 kaumāra ācaret prājño dharmān bhāgavatān iha
analyzed: kaumāre ācaret prājñaḥ dharmān bhāgavatān iha
durlabham mānuṣam janma tat api adhruvam artha dam

original: BhP_07.06.002/1 yathā hi puruṣasyeha viṣṇoḥ pādopasarpaṇam
analyzed: yathā hi puruṣasya iha viṣṇoḥ pāda upasarpaṇam

original: BhP_07.06.002/2 yadeṣa sarvabhūtānāṃ priya ātmeśvaraḥ suhṛt
analyzed: yat eṣa sarva bhūtānām priyaḥ ātma īśvaraḥ suhṛd
sukham aindriyakam daityāḥ deha yogena dehinām
sarvatra labhyate daivāt yathā duḥkham ayatnataḥ

original: BhP_07.06.004/1 tatprayāso na kartavyo yata āyurvyayaḥ param
analyzed: tad prayāsaḥ na kartavyaḥ yatas āyuḥ vyayaḥ param

original: BhP_07.06.004/2 na tathā vindate kṣemaṃ mukundacaraṇāmbujam
analyzed: na tathā vindate kṣemam mukunda caraṇa ambujam

original: BhP_07.06.005/1 tato yateta kuśalaḥ kṣemāya bhavamāśritaḥ
analyzed: tatas yateta kuśalaḥ kṣemāya bhavam āśritaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.005/2 śarīraṃ pauruṣaṃ yāvan na vipadyeta puṣkalam
analyzed: śarīram pauruṣam yāvat na vipadyeta puṣkalam
puṃsaḥ varṣa śatam hi āyuḥ tad ardham ca ajita ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.006/2 niṣphalaṃ yadasau rātryāṃ śete 'ndhaṃ prāpitastamaḥ
analyzed: niṣphalam yat asau rātryām śete prāpitaḥ tamaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.007/1 mugdhasya bālye kaiśore krīḍato yāti viṃśatiḥ
analyzed: mugdhasya bālye kaiśore krīḍataḥ yāti viṃśatiḥ
jarayā grasta dehasya yāti akalpasya viṃśatiḥ

original: BhP_07.06.008/1 durāpūreṇa kāmena mohena ca balīyasā
analyzed: durāpūreṇa kāmena mohena ca balīyasā

original: BhP_07.06.008/2 śeṣaṃ gṛheṣu saktasya pramattasyāpayāti hi
analyzed: śeṣam gṛheṣu saktasya pramattasya apayāti hi
kaḥ gṛheṣu pumān saktam ātmānam ajita indriyaḥ
sneha pāśaiḥ dṛḍhaiḥ baddham utsaheta vimocitum

original: BhP_07.06.010/1 ko nvarthatṛṣṇāṃ visṛjet prāṇebhyo 'pi ya īpsitaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu artha tṛṣṇām visṛjet prāṇebhyaḥ pi yaḥ īpsitaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.010/2 yaṃ krīṇātyasubhiḥ preṣṭhaistaskaraḥ sevako vaṇik
analyzed: yam krīṇāti asubhiḥ preṣṭhaiḥ taskaraḥ sevakaḥ vaṇij

original: BhP_07.06.011/1 kathaṃ priyāyā anukampitāyāḥ saṅgaṃ rahasyaṃ rucirāṃśca mantrān
analyzed: katham priyāyāḥ anukampitāyāḥ saṅgam rahasyam rucirān ca mantrān
suhṛtsu tad sneha sitaḥ śiśūnām kalā akṣarāṇām anurakta cittaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.012/1 putrān smaraṃstā duhitṝrhṛdayyā bhrātṝn svasṝrvā pitarau ca dīnau
analyzed: putrān smaran tāḥ duhitṝḥ hṛdayyāḥ bhrātṝn svasṝḥ vā pitarau ca dīnau

original: BhP_07.06.012/2 gṛhān manojñoruparicchadāṃśca vṛttīśca kulyāḥ paśubhṛtyavargān
analyzed: gṛhān manojña ūru paricchadān ca vṛttīḥ ca kulyāḥ paśu bhṛtya vargān
tyajeta kośaskṛt iva īhamānaḥ karmāṇi lobhāt a vitṛpta kāmaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.013/2 aupasthyajaihvaṃ bahumanyamānaḥ kathaṃ virajyeta durantamohaḥ
analyzed: aupasthya jaihvam bahu manyamānaḥ katham virajyeta duranta mohaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.014/1 kuṭumbapoṣāya viyan nijāyur na budhyate 'rthaṃ vihataṃ pramattaḥ
analyzed: kuṭumba poṣāya viyat nija āyuḥ na budhyate ṛtham vihatam pramattaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.014/2 sarvatra tāpatrayaduḥkhitātmā nirvidyate na svakuṭumbarāmaḥ
analyzed: sarvatra tāpa traya duḥkhita ātmā nirvidyate na sva kuṭumba rāmaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.015/1 vitteṣu nityābhiniviṣṭacetā vidvāṃśca doṣaṃ paravittahartuḥ
analyzed: vitteṣu nitya abhiniviṣṭa cetāḥ vidvān ca doṣam para vitta hartuḥ

original: BhP_07.06.015/2 pretyeha vāthāpyajitendriyastad aśāntakāmo harate kuṭumbī
analyzed: pretya iha vā atha api ajita indriyaḥ tat aśānta kāmaḥ harate kuṭumbī

original: BhP_07.06.016/1 vidvān apītthaṃ danujāḥ kuṭumbaṃ puṣṇan svalokāya na kalpate vai
analyzed: vidvān api ittham danujāḥ kuṭumbam puṣṇan sva lokāya na kalpate vai

original: BhP_07.06.016/2 yaḥ svīyapārakyavibhinnabhāvas tamaḥ prapadyeta yathā vimūḍhaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ svīya pārakya vibhinna bhāvaḥ tamaḥ prapadyeta yathā vimūḍhaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.017/1 yato na kaścit kva ca kutracidvā dīnaḥ svamātmānamalaṃ samarthaḥ
analyzed: yatas na kaścid kva ca kutracid vā dīnaḥ svam ātmānam alam samarthaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.017/2 vimocituṃ kāmadṛśāṃ vihāra krīḍāmṛgo yannigaḍo visargaḥ
analyzed: vimocitum kāma dṛśām vihāra krīḍāmṛgaḥ yat nigaḍaḥ visargaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.018/1 tato vidūrāt parihṛtya daityā daityeṣu saṅgaṃ viṣayātmakeṣu
analyzed: tatas vidūrāt parihṛtya daityāḥ daityeṣu saṅgam viṣaya ātmakeṣu
upeta nārāyaṇam ādidevam sa mukta saṅgaiḥ iṣitaḥ pavargaḥ
na hi acyutam prīṇayataḥ sura ātmajāḥ
ātma tvāt sarva bhūtānām siddha tvāt iha sarvatas
parāvareṣu bhūteṣu brahma anta sthāvara ādiṣu

original: BhP_07.06.020/2 bhautikeṣu vikāreṣu bhūteṣvatha mahatsu ca
analyzed: bhautikeṣu vikāreṣu bhūteṣu atha mahatsu ca

original: BhP_07.06.021/1 guṇeṣu guṇasāmye ca guṇavyatikare tathā
analyzed: guṇeṣu guṇa sāmye ca guṇa vyatikare tathā

original: BhP_07.06.021/2 eka eva paro hyātmā bhagavān īśvaro 'vyayaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva paraḥ hi ātmā bhagavān īśvaraḥ vyayaḥ
pratyagātma svarūpeṇa dṛśya rūpeṇa ca svayam
vyāpya vyāpaka nirdeśyaḥ hi anirdeśyaḥ vikalpitaḥ
māyayā antarhita aiśvaryaḥ īyate guṇa sargayā

original: BhP_07.06.024/1 tasmāt sarveṣu bhūteṣu dayāṃ kuruta sauhṛdam
analyzed: tasmāt sarveṣu bhūteṣu dayām kuruta sauhṛdam
bhāvam āsuram unmucya yayā tuṣyati adhokṣajaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.025/1 tuṣṭe ca tatra kimalabhyamananta ādye
analyzed: tuṣṭe ca tatra kim alabhyam anante ādye
kim taiḥ guṇa vyatikarāt iha ye sva siddhāḥ
dharma ādayaḥ kim aguṇena ca kāṅkṣitena
sāram juṣām caraṇayoḥ upagāyatām naḥ
dharma artha kāmaḥ iti yaḥ bhihitaḥ trivarga

original: BhP_07.06.026/2 īkṣā trayī nayadamau vividhā ca vārtā
analyzed: īkṣā trayī naya damau vividhā ca vārtā
manye tat etat akhilam nigamasya satyam
sva ātma arpaṇam sva suhṛdaḥ paramasya puṃsaḥ
jñānam tat etat amalam duravāpam āha
nārāyaṇaḥ nara sakhaḥ kila nāradāya
ekāntinām bhagavataḥ tat akiñcanānām
pāda aravinda rajasā āpluta dehinām syāt

original: BhP_07.06.028/1 śrutametan mayā pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānasaṃyutam
analyzed: śrutam etat mayā pūrvam jñānam vijñāna saṃyutam
dharmam bhāgavatam śuddham nāradāt devadarśanāt
śrī daitya putrāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.06.029/1 prahrāda tvaṃ vayaṃ cāpi narte 'nyaṃ vidmahe gurum
analyzed: prahrāda tvam vayam ca api narte vidmahe gurum
etābhyām guru putrābhyām bālānām api hi īśvarau
bālasya antaḥpura sthasya mahat saṅgaḥ duranvayaḥ

original: BhP_07.06.030/2 chindhi naḥ saṃśayaṃ saumya syāc cedvisrambhakāraṇam
analyzed: chindhi naḥ saṃśayam saumya syāt ced visrambha kāraṇam
uvāca
evam daitya sutaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ suraḥ

original: BhP_07.07.001/2 uvāca tān smayamānaḥ smaran madanubhāṣitam
analyzed: uvāca tān smayamānaḥ smaran mad anubhāṣitam
śrī prahrādaḥ uvāca
pitari prasthite smākam tapase mandara acalam

original: BhP_07.07.002/2 yuddhodyamaṃ paraṃ cakrurvibudhā dānavān prati
analyzed: yuddha udyamam param cakruḥ vibudhāḥ dānavān prati
pipīlikaiḥ ahiḥ iva diṣṭyā loka upatāpanaḥ
pāpena pāpaḥ bhakṣī iti vadantaḥ vāsava ādayaḥ
teṣām ati bala udyogam niśamya asura yūthapāḥ

original: BhP_07.07.004/2 vadhyamānāḥ surairbhītā dudruvuḥ sarvato diśam
analyzed: vadhyamānāḥ suraiḥ bhītāḥ dudruvuḥ sarvatas diśam
kalatra putra vitta āptān gṛhān paśu paricchadān
na avekṣyamāṇāḥ tvaritāḥ sarve prāṇa parīpsavaḥ
vyalumpan rāja śibiram amarāḥ jaya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_07.07.006/2 indrastu rājamahiṣīṃ mātaraṃ mama cāgrahīt
analyzed: indraḥ tu rāja mahiṣīm mātaram mama ca agrahīt
nīyamānām bhaya udvignām rudatīm kurarīm iva
yadṛcchayā āgataḥ tatra devarṣiḥ dadṛśe pathi
prāha na enām surapate netum arhasi anāgasam

original: BhP_07.07.008/2 muñca muñca mahābhāga satīṃ paraparigraham
analyzed: muñca muñca mahābhāga satīm para parigraham
uvāca
āste syāḥ jaṭhare vīryam aviṣahyam suradviṣaḥ

original: BhP_07.07.009/2 āsyatāṃ yāvat prasavaṃ mokṣye 'rthapadavīṃ gataḥ
analyzed: āsyatām yāvat prasavam mokṣye ṛtha padavīm gataḥ
uvāca

original: BhP_07.07.010/1 ayaṃ niṣkilbiṣaḥ sākṣān mahābhāgavato mahān
analyzed: ayam niṣkilbiṣaḥ sākṣāt mahābhāgavataḥ mahān

original: BhP_07.07.010/2 tvayā na prāpsyate saṃsthāmanantānucaro balī
analyzed: tvayā na prāpsyate saṃsthām ananta anucaraḥ balī
iti uktaḥ tām vihāya indraḥ devarṣeḥ mānayan vacaḥ
ananta priya bhaktyā enām parikramya divam yayau

original: BhP_07.07.012/1 tato me mātaramṛṣiḥ samānīya nijāśrame
analyzed: tatas me mātaram ṛṣiḥ samānīya nija āśrame

original: BhP_07.07.012/2 āśvāsyehoṣyatāṃ vatse yāvat te bharturāgamaḥ
analyzed: āśvāsya iha uṣyatām vatse yāvat te bhartuḥ āgamaḥ
tathā iti avātsīt devarṣeḥ antike sā akutobhayā
yāvat daitya patiḥ ghorāt tapasaḥ na nyavartata

original: BhP_07.07.014/1 ṛṣiṃ paryacarat tatra bhaktyā paramayā satī
analyzed: ṛṣim paryacarat tatra bhaktyā paramayā satī
antarvatnī sva garbhasya kṣemāya icchā prasūtaye
ṛṣiḥ kāruṇikaḥ tasyāḥ prādāt ubhayam īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_07.07.015/2 dharmasya tattvaṃ jñānaṃ ca māmapyuddiśya nirmalam
analyzed: dharmasya tattvam jñānam ca mām api uddiśya nirmalam

original: BhP_07.07.016/1 tat tu kālasya dīrghatvāt strītvān mātustirodadhe
analyzed: tat tu kālasya dīrgha tvāt strī tvāt mātuḥ tirodadhe
ṛṣiṇā anugṛhītam mām na adhunā api ajahāt smṛtiḥ

original: BhP_07.07.017/1 bhavatāmapi bhūyān me yadi śraddadhate vacaḥ
analyzed: bhavatām api bhūyāt me yadi śraddadhate vacaḥ

original: BhP_07.07.017/2 vaiśāradī dhīḥ śraddhātaḥ strībālānāṃ ca me yathā
analyzed: vaiśāradī dhīḥ śraddhātaḥ strī bālānām ca me yathā

original: BhP_07.07.018/1 janmādyāḥ ṣaḍ ime bhāvā dṛṣṭā dehasya nātmanaḥ
analyzed: janma ādyāḥ ṣaṭ ime bhāvāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ dehasya na ātmanaḥ
phalānām iva vṛkṣasya kālena īśvara mūrtinā

original: BhP_07.07.019/1 ātmā nityo 'vyayaḥ śuddha ekaḥ kṣetrajña āśrayaḥ
analyzed: ātmā nityaḥ vyayaḥ śuddhaḥ ekaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ āśrayaḥ
avikriyaḥ svadṛś hetuḥ vyāpakaḥ saṅgī anāvṛtaḥ
etaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ vidvān ātmanaḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ paraiḥ

original: BhP_07.07.020/2 ahaṃ mametyasadbhāvaṃ dehādau mohajaṃ tyajet
analyzed: aham mama iti asadbhāvam deha ādau moha jam tyajet

original: BhP_07.07.021/1 svarṇaṃ yathā grāvasu hemakāraḥ kṣetreṣu yogaistadabhijña āpnuyāt
analyzed: svarṇam yathā grāvasu hemakāraḥ kṣetreṣu yogaiḥ tad abhijñaḥ āpnuyāt

original: BhP_07.07.021/2 kṣetreṣu deheṣu tathātmayogair adhyātmavidbrahmagatiṃ labheta
analyzed: kṣetreṣu deheṣu tathā ātma yogaiḥ adhyātma vid brahma gatim labheta

original: BhP_07.07.022/1 aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ proktāstraya eva hi tadguṇāḥ
analyzed: aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ proktāḥ trayaḥ eva hi tad guṇāḥ

original: BhP_07.07.022/2 vikārāḥ ṣoḍaśācāryaiḥ pumān ekaḥ samanvayāt
analyzed: vikārāḥ ṣoḍaśa ācāryaiḥ pumān ekaḥ samanvayāt

original: BhP_07.07.023/1 dehastu sarvasaṅghāto jagat tasthuriti dvidhā
analyzed: dehaḥ tu sarva saṅghātaḥ jagat tasthuḥ iti dvidhā

original: BhP_07.07.023/2 atraiva mṛgyaḥ puruṣo neti netītyatat tyajan
analyzed: atra eva mṛgyaḥ puruṣaḥ na iti na iti iti a tat tyajan
anvaya vyatirekeṇa vivekena uśatā ātmanā
svarga sthāna samāmnāyaiḥ vimṛśadbhiḥ asatvaraiḥ
buddheḥ jāgaraṇam svapnaḥ suṣuptiḥ iti vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_07.07.025/2 tā yenaivānubhūyante so 'dhyakṣaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: tāḥ yena eva anubhūyante saḥ dhī akṣaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ
ebhiḥ tri varṇaiḥ paryastaiḥ buddhi bhedaiḥ kriyā udbhavaiḥ
sva rūpam ātmanaḥ budhyet gandhaiḥ vāyum iva anvayāt
etad dvāraḥ hi saṃsāraḥ guṇa karma nibandhanaḥ
ajñāna mūlaḥ pārthaḥ pi puṃsaḥ svapnaḥ iva arpyate
tasmāt bhavadbhiḥ kartavyam karmaṇām triguṇa ātmanām
bīja nirharaṇam yogaḥ pravāha uparamaḥ dhiyaḥ
tatra upāya sahasrāṇām ayam bhagavatā uditaḥ

original: BhP_07.07.029/2 yadīśvare bhagavati yathā yairañjasā ratiḥ
analyzed: yadi īśvare bhagavati yathā yaiḥ añjasā ratiḥ
guru śuśrūṣayā bhaktyā sarva labdha arpaṇena ca
saṅgena sādhu bhaktānām īśvara ārādhanena ca
śraddhayā tad kathāyām ca kīrtanaiḥ guṇa karmaṇām

original: BhP_07.07.032/1 hariḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhagavān āsta īśvaraḥ
analyzed: hariḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhagavān āste īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_07.07.032/2 iti bhūtāni manasā kāmaistaiḥ sādhu mānayet
analyzed: iti bhūtāni manasā kāmaiḥ taiḥ sādhu mānayet
evam nirjita ṣaḍvargaiḥ kriyate bhaktiḥ īśvare

original: BhP_07.07.033/2 vāsudeve bhagavati yayā saṃlabhyate ratiḥ
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati yayā saṃlabhyate ratiḥ

original: BhP_07.07.034/1 niśamya karmāṇi guṇān atulyān vīryāṇi līlātanubhiḥ kṛtāni
analyzed: niśamya karmāṇi guṇān atulyān vīryāṇi līlā tanubhiḥ kṛtāni

original: BhP_07.07.034/2 yadātiharṣotpulakāśrugadgadaṃ protkaṇṭha udgāyati rauti nṛtyati
analyzed: yadā ati harṣa utpulaka aśru gadgadam protkaṇṭhaḥ udgāyati rauti nṛtyati

original: BhP_07.07.035/1 yadā grahagrasta iva kvaciddhasaty ākrandate dhyāyati vandate janam
analyzed: yadā graha grastaḥ iva kvacid hasati ākrandate dhyāyati vandate janam

original: BhP_07.07.035/2 muhuḥ śvasan vakti hare jagatpate nārāyaṇetyātmamatirgatatrapaḥ
analyzed: muhur śvasan vakti hare jagatpate nārāyaṇa iti ātma matiḥ gata trapaḥ
tadā pumān mukta samasta bandhanaḥ tad bhāva bhāva anukṛta āśaya ākṛtiḥ
nirdagdha bīja anuśayaḥ mahīyasā bhakti prayogeṇa sametya adhokṣajam
adhokṣaja ālambham iha aśubha ātmanaḥ śarīriṇaḥ saṃsṛti cakra śātanam

original: BhP_07.07.037/2 tadbrahmanirvāṇasukhaṃ vidurbudhās tato bhajadhvaṃ hṛdaye hṛdīśvaram
analyzed: tat brahma nirvāṇa sukham viduḥ budhāḥ tatas bhajadhvam hṛdaye hṛdi īśvaram

original: BhP_07.07.038/1 ko 'tiprayāso 'surabālakā harer upāsane sve hṛdi chidravat sataḥ
analyzed: sura bālakāḥ hareḥ upāsane sve hṛdi chidra vat sataḥ

original: BhP_07.07.038/2 svasyātmanaḥ sakhyuraśeṣadehināṃ sāmānyataḥ kiṃ viṣayopapādanaiḥ
analyzed: svasya ātmanaḥ sakhyuḥ aśeṣa dehinām sāmānyatas kim viṣaya upapādanaiḥ

original: BhP_07.07.039/1 rāyaḥ kalatraṃ paśavaḥ sutādayo gṛhā mahī kuñjarakośabhūtayaḥ
analyzed: rāyaḥ kalatram paśavaḥ suta ādayaḥ gṛhāḥ mahī kuñjara kośa bhūtayaḥ

original: BhP_07.07.039/2 sarve 'rthakāmāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāyuṣaḥ kurvanti martyasya kiyat priyaṃ calāḥ
analyzed: sarve ṛtha kāmāḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅgura āyuṣaḥ kurvanti martyasya kiyat priyam calāḥ

original: BhP_07.07.040/1 evaṃ hi lokāḥ kratubhiḥ kṛtā amī kṣayiṣṇavaḥ sātiśayā na nirmalāḥ
analyzed: evam hi lokāḥ kratubhiḥ kṛtāḥ amī kṣayiṣṇavaḥ sa atiśayāḥ na nirmalāḥ
tasmāt adṛṣṭa śruta dūṣaṇam param bhaktyā uktayā īśam bhajata ātma labdhaye

original: BhP_07.07.041/1 yadartha iha karmāṇi vidvanmānyasakṛn naraḥ
analyzed: yad arthe iha karmāṇi vidvanmāni asakṛt naraḥ
karoti atas viparyāsam amogham vindate phalam

original: BhP_07.07.042/1 sukhāya duḥkhamokṣāya saṅkalpa iha karmiṇaḥ
analyzed: sukhāya duḥkha mokṣāya saṅkalpaḥ iha karmiṇaḥ
sadā āpnoti īhayā duḥkham anīhāyāḥ sukha āvṛtaḥ
kāmān kāmayate kāmyaiḥ yad artham iha pūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_07.07.043/2 sa vai dehastu pārakyo bhaṅguro yātyupaiti ca
analyzed: sa vai dehaḥ tu pārakyaḥ bhaṅguraḥ yāti upaiti ca
kimu dāra āgāra dhana ādayaḥ
rājya kośa gaja amātya bhṛtya āptāḥ mamatā āspadāḥ
kim etaiḥ ātmanaḥ tucchaiḥ saha dehena naśvaraiḥ
anarthaiḥ artha saṅkāśaiḥ nitya ānanda rasa udadheḥ
nirūpyatām iha sva arthaḥ kiyān surāḥ
niṣeka ādiṣu avasthāsu kliśyamānasya karmabhiḥ
karmāṇi ārabhate dehī dehena ātma anuvartinā
karmabhiḥ tanute deham ubhayam tu avivekataḥ
tasmāt arthāḥ ca kāmāḥ ca dharmāḥ ca yad apāśrayāḥ
bhajata anīhayā ātmānam anīham harim īśvaram
sarveṣām api bhūtānām hariḥ ātma īśvaraḥ priyaḥ
bhūtaiḥ mahadbhiḥ sva kṛtaiḥ kṛtānām jīva saṃjñitaḥ

original: BhP_07.07.050/1 devo 'suro manuṣyo vā yakṣo gandharva eva vā
analyzed: suraḥ manuṣyaḥ vā yakṣaḥ gandharvaḥ eva vā

original: BhP_07.07.050/2 bhajan mukundacaraṇaṃ svastimān syādyathā vayam
analyzed: bhajan mukunda caraṇam svastimān syāt yathā vayam
na alam dvija tvam deva tvam ṛṣi tvam vā asura ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_07.07.051/2 prīṇanāya mukundasya na vṛttaṃ na bahujñatā
analyzed: prīṇanāya mukundasya na vṛttam na bahu jña tā

original: BhP_07.07.052/1 na dānaṃ na tapo nejyā na śaucaṃ na vratāni ca
analyzed: na dānam na tapaḥ na ijyā na śaucam na vratāni ca
prīyate malayā bhaktyā hariḥ anyat viḍambanam

original: BhP_07.07.053/1 tato harau bhagavati bhaktiṃ kuruta dānavāḥ
analyzed: tatas harau bhagavati bhaktim kuruta dānavāḥ
ātma aupamyena sarvatra sarva bhūta ātmani īśvare

original: BhP_07.07.054/1 daiteyā yakṣarakṣāṃsi striyaḥ śūdrā vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: daiteyāḥ yakṣa rakṣāṃsi striyaḥ śūdrāḥ vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_07.07.054/2 khagā mṛgāḥ pāpajīvāḥ santi hyacyutatāṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: khagāḥ mṛgāḥ pāpa jīvāḥ santi hi acyuta tām gatāḥ

original: BhP_07.07.055/1 etāvān eva loke 'smin puṃsaḥ svārthaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: etāvān eva loke smin puṃsaḥ sva arthaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ
ekānta bhaktiḥ govinde yat sarvatra tat īkṣaṇam
uvāca

original: BhP_07.08.001/1 atha daityasutāḥ sarve śrutvā tadanuvarṇitam
analyzed: atha daitya sutāḥ sarve śrutvā tat anuvarṇitam
jagṛhuḥ niravadya tvāt na eva guru anuśikṣitam
atha ācārya sutaḥ teṣām buddhim ekānta saṃsthitām
ālakṣya bhītaḥ tvaritaḥ rājñaḥ āvedayat yathā

original: BhP_07.08.003/1 śrutvā tadapriyaṃ daityo duḥsahaṃ tanayānayam
analyzed: śrutvā tat apriyam daityaḥ duḥsaham tanaya anayam

original: BhP_07.08.003/2 kopāveśacaladgātraḥ putraṃ hantuṃ mano dadhe
analyzed: kopa āveśa calat gātraḥ putram hantum manaḥ dadhe
kṣiptvā paruṣayā vācā prahrādam atadarhaṇam
āha īkṣamāṇaḥ pāpena tiraścīnena cakṣuṣā
praśraya avanatam dāntam baddhāñjalim avasthitam

original: BhP_07.08.005/2 sarpaḥ padāhata iva śvasan prakṛtidāruṇaḥ
analyzed: sarpaḥ pada āhataḥ iva śvasan prakṛti dāruṇaḥ
śrī hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca
he durvinīta manda ātman kula bheda kara adhama

original: BhP_07.08.006/2 stabdhaṃ macchāsanodvṛttaṃ neṣye tvādya yamakṣayam
analyzed: stabdham mad śāsana udvṛttam neṣye tvā adya yama kṣayam

original: BhP_07.08.007/1 kruddhasya yasya kampante trayo lokāḥ saheśvarāḥ
analyzed: kruddhasya yasya kampante trayaḥ lokāḥ saha īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_07.08.007/2 tasya me 'bhītavan mūḍha śāsanaṃ kiṃ balo 'tyagāḥ
analyzed: tasya me bhīta vat mūḍha śāsanam kim balo tyagāḥ
śrī prahrādaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_07.08.008/1 na kevalaṃ me bhavataśca rājan sa vai balaṃ balināṃ cāpareṣām
analyzed: na kevalam me bhavataḥ ca rājan sa vai balam balinām ca apareṣām

original: BhP_07.08.008/2 pare 'vare 'mī sthirajaṅgamā ye brahmādayo yena vaśaṃ praṇītāḥ
analyzed: pare vare sthira jaṅgamāḥ ye brahma ādayaḥ yena vaśam praṇītāḥ

original: BhP_07.08.009/1 sa īśvaraḥ kāla urukramo 'sāv ojaḥ sahaḥ sattvabalendriyātmā
analyzed: saḥ īśvaraḥ kālaḥ uru kramaḥ saḥ ojaḥ sahaḥ sattva bala indriya ātmā

original: BhP_07.08.009/2 sa eva viśvaṃ paramaḥ svaśaktibhiḥ sṛjatyavatyatti guṇatrayeśaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva viśvam paramaḥ sva śaktibhiḥ sṛjati avati atti guṇatraya īśaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.010/1 jahyāsuraṃ bhāvamimaṃ tvamātmanaḥ samaṃ mano dhatsva na santi vidviṣaḥ
analyzed: jahi āsuram bhāvam imam tvam ātmanaḥ samam manaḥ dhatsva na santi vidviṣaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.010/2 ṛte 'jitādātmana utpathe sthitāt taddhi hyanantasya mahat samarhaṇam
analyzed: ṛte jitāt ātmanaḥ utpathe sthitāt tat hi hi anantasya mahat samarhaṇam

original: BhP_07.08.011/1 dasyūn purā ṣaṇ na vijitya lumpato manyanta eke svajitā diśo daśa
analyzed: dasyūn purā ṣaṭ na vijitya lumpataḥ manyante eke sva jitāḥ diśaḥ daśa

original: BhP_07.08.011/2 jitātmano jñasya samasya dehināṃ sādhoḥ svamohaprabhavāḥ kutaḥ pare
analyzed: jita ātmanaḥ jñasya samasya dehinām sādhoḥ sva moha prabhavāḥ kutas pare
śrī hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_07.08.012/1 vyaktaṃ tvaṃ martukāmo 'si yo 'timātraṃ vikatthase
analyzed: vyaktam tvam martu kāmaḥ si timātram vikatthase

original: BhP_07.08.012/2 mumūrṣūṇāṃ hi mandātman nanu syurviklavā giraḥ
analyzed: mumūrṣūṇām hi manda ātman nanu syuḥ viklavāḥ giraḥ
yaḥ tvayā mandabhāgya uktaḥ mad anyaḥ jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_07.08.013/2 kvāsau yadi sa sarvatra kasmāt stambhe na dṛśyate
analyzed: kva asau yadi sa sarvatra kasmāt stambhe na dṛśyate

original: BhP_07.08.014/1 so 'haṃ vikatthamānasya śiraḥ kāyāddharāmi te
analyzed: saḥ ham vikatthamānasya śiraḥ kāyāt harāmi te
gopāyeta hariḥ tvā adya yaḥ te śaraṇam īpsitam

original: BhP_07.08.015/1 evaṃ duruktairmuhurardayan ruṣā sutaṃ mahābhāgavataṃ mahāsuraḥ
analyzed: evam duruktaiḥ muhur ardayan ruṣā sutam mahā bhāgavatam mahā asuraḥ

original: BhP_07.08.015/2 khaḍgaṃ pragṛhyotpatito varāsanāt stambhaṃ tatāḍātibalaḥ svamuṣṭinā
analyzed: khaḍgam pragṛhya utpatitaḥ varāsanāt stambham tatāḍa atibalaḥ sva muṣṭinā

original: BhP_07.08.016/1 tadaiva tasmin ninado 'tibhīṣaṇo babhūva yenāṇḍakaṭāhamasphuṭat
analyzed: tadā eva tasmin ninadaḥ ti bhīṣaṇaḥ babhūva yena aṇḍa kaṭāham asphuṭat

original: BhP_07.08.016/2 yaṃ vai svadhiṣṇyopagataṃ tvajādayaḥ śrutvā svadhāmātyayamaṅga menire
analyzed: yam vai sva dhiṣṇya upagatam tu aja ādayaḥ śrutvā svadhā amātyayam aṅga menire

original: BhP_07.08.017/1 sa vikraman putravadhepsurojasā niśamya nirhrādamapūrvamadbhutam
analyzed: sa vikraman putra vadha īpsuḥ ojasā niśamya nirhrādam apūrvam adbhutam

original: BhP_07.08.017/2 antaḥsabhāyāṃ na dadarśa tatpadaṃ vitatrasuryena surāriyūthapāḥ
analyzed: antar sabhāyām na dadarśa tat padam vitatrasuḥ yena surāri yūthapāḥ

original: BhP_07.08.018/1 satyaṃ vidhātuṃ nijabhṛtyabhāṣitaṃ vyāptiṃ ca bhūteṣvakhileṣu cātmanaḥ
analyzed: satyam vidhātum nija bhṛtya bhāṣitam vyāptim ca bhūteṣu akhileṣu ca ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.018/2 adṛśyatātyadbhutarūpamudvahan stambhe sabhāyāṃ na mṛgaṃ na mānuṣam
analyzed: adṛśyata ati adbhuta rūpam udvahan stambhe sabhāyām na mṛgam na mānuṣam

original: BhP_07.08.019/1 sa sattvamenaṃ parito vipaśyan stambhasya madhyādanunirjihānam
analyzed: sa sattvam enam paritas vipaśyan stambhasya madhyāt anunirjihānam

original: BhP_07.08.019/2 nāyaṃ mṛgo nāpi naro vicitram aho kimetan nṛmṛgendrarūpam
analyzed: na ayam mṛgaḥ nā api naraḥ vicitram aho kim etat nṛ mṛgendra rūpam
mīmāṃsamānasya samutthitaḥ gratas nṛsiṃha rūpaḥ tat alam bhayānakam
pratapta cāmīkara caṇḍa locanam sphurat saṭā kesara jṛmbhita ānanam
karāla daṃṣṭram karavāla cañcala kṣura anta jihvam bhrukuṭī mukha ulbaṇam
stabdha ūrdhva karṇam giri kandara adbhuta vyātta āsya nāsam hanu bheda bhīṣaṇam
divi spṛśat kāyam adīrgha pīvara grīvā ūru vakṣaḥ sthalam alpa madhyamam

original: BhP_07.08.022/2 candrāṃśugauraiśchuritaṃ tanūruhair viṣvag bhujānīkaśataṃ nakhāyudham
analyzed: candra aṃśu gauraiḥ churitam tanūruhaiḥ bhuja anīka śatam nakha āyudham
durāsadam sarva nija itara āyudha praveka vidrāvita daitya dānavam

original: BhP_07.08.023/2 prāyeṇa me 'yaṃ hariṇorumāyinā vadhaḥ smṛto 'nena samudyatena kim
analyzed: prāyeṇa me yam hariṇā ūru māyinā vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ nena samudyatena kim

original: BhP_07.08.024/1 evaṃ bruvaṃstvabhyapatadgadāyudho nadan nṛsiṃhaṃ prati daityakuñjaraḥ
analyzed: evam bruvan tu abhyapatat gadā āyudhaḥ nadan nṛsiṃham prati daitya kuñjaraḥ

original: BhP_07.08.024/2 alakṣito 'gnau patitaḥ pataṅgamo yathā nṛsiṃhaujasi so 'surastadā
analyzed: alakṣitaḥ gnau patitaḥ pataṅgamaḥ yathā nṛsiṃha ojasi saḥ suraḥ tadā

original: BhP_07.08.025/1 na tadvicitraṃ khalu sattvadhāmani svatejasā yo nu purāpibat tamaḥ
analyzed: na tat vicitram khalu sattva dhāmani sva tejasā yaḥ nu purā apibat tamaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.025/2 tato 'bhipadyābhyahanan mahāsuro ruṣā nṛsiṃhaṃ gadayoruvegayā
analyzed: tatas bhipadya abhyahanat mahā asuraḥ ruṣā nṛsiṃham gadayā uru vegayā

original: BhP_07.08.026/1 taṃ vikramantaṃ sagadaṃ gadādharo mahoragaṃ tārkṣyasuto yathāgrahīt
analyzed: tam vikramantam sa gadam gadā dharaḥ mahā uragam tārkṣya sutaḥ yathā agrahīt

original: BhP_07.08.026/2 sa tasya hastotkalitastadāsuro vikrīḍato yadvadahirgarutmataḥ
analyzed: sa tasya hasta utkalitaḥ tadā asuraḥ vikrīḍataḥ yadvat ahiḥ garutmataḥ

original: BhP_07.08.027/1 asādhvamanyanta hṛtaukaso 'marā ghanacchadā bhārata sarvadhiṣṇyapāḥ
analyzed: asādhu amanyanta hṛtaukasaḥ marāḥ ghanacchadāḥ bhārata sarva dhiṣṇya pāḥ

original: BhP_07.08.027/2 taṃ manyamāno nijavīryaśaṅkitaṃ yaddhastamukto nṛhariṃ mahāsuraḥ
analyzed: tam manyamānaḥ nija vīrya śaṅkitam yat hasta muktaḥ nṛharim mahā asuraḥ

original: BhP_07.08.027/3 punastamāsajjata khaḍgacarmaṇī pragṛhya vegena gataśramo mṛdhe
analyzed: punar tam āsajjata khaḍga carmaṇī pragṛhya vegena gata śramaḥ mṛdhe

original: BhP_07.08.028/1 taṃ śyenavegaṃ śatacandravartmabhiś carantamacchidramuparyadho hariḥ
analyzed: tam śyenavegam śata candra vartmabhiḥ carantam acchidram upari adhas hariḥ

original: BhP_07.08.028/2 kṛtvāṭṭahāsaṃ kharamutsvanolbaṇaṃ nimīlitākṣaṃ jagṛhe mahājavaḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā aṭṭahāsam kharam utsvana ulbaṇam nimīlita akṣam jagṛhe mahā javaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.029/1 viṣvak sphurantaṃ grahaṇāturaṃ harir vyālo yathākhuṃ kuliśākṣatatvacam
analyzed: viṣvak sphurantam grahaṇa āturam hariḥ vyālaḥ yathā ākhum kuliśa akṣata tvacam

original: BhP_07.08.029/2 dvāryūrumāpatya dadāra līlayā nakhairyathāhiṃ garuḍo mahāviṣam
analyzed: dvāri ūrum āpatya dadāra līlayā nakhaiḥ yathā ahim garuḍaḥ mahā viṣam
saṃrambha duṣprekṣya karāla locanaḥ vyātta ānana antam vilihan sva jihvayā
asṛj lava akta aruṇa kesara ānanaḥ yathā antra mālī dvipa hatyayā hariḥ
nakha aṅkura utpāṭita hṛd saroruham visṛjya tasya anucarān udāyudhān

original: BhP_07.08.031/2 ahan samastān nakhaśastrapāṇibhir dordaṇḍayūtho 'nupathān sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: ahan samastān nakha śastra pāṇibhiḥ dos daṇḍa yūthaḥ nu pathān sahasraśas

original: BhP_07.08.032/1 saṭāvadhūtā jaladāḥ parāpatan grahāśca taddṛṣṭivimuṣṭarociṣaḥ
analyzed: saṭā avadhūtāḥ jaladāḥ parāpatan grahāḥ ca tad dṛṣṭi vimuṣṭa rociṣaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.032/2 ambhodhayaḥ śvāsahatā vicukṣubhur nirhrādabhītā digibhā vicukruśuḥ
analyzed: ambhodhayaḥ śvāsa hatāḥ vicukṣubhuḥ nirhrāda bhītāḥ diś ibhāḥ vicukruśuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.033/1 dyaustatsaṭotkṣiptavimānasaṅkulā protsarpata kṣmā ca padābhipīḍitā
analyzed: dyauḥ tad saṭā utkṣipta vimāna saṅkulā protsarpata kṣmā ca pada abhipīḍitā

original: BhP_07.08.033/2 śailāḥ samutpeturamuṣya raṃhasā tattejasā khaṃ kakubho na rejire
analyzed: śailāḥ samutpetuḥ amuṣya raṃhasā tad tejasā kham kakubhaḥ na

original: BhP_07.08.034/1 tataḥ sabhāyāmupaviṣṭamuttame nṛpāsane sambhṛtatejasaṃ vibhum
analyzed: tatas sabhāyām upaviṣṭam uttame nṛpa āsane sambhṛta tejasam vibhum

original: BhP_07.08.034/2 alakṣitadvairathamatyamarṣaṇaṃ pracaṇḍavaktraṃ na babhāja kaścana
analyzed: alakṣita dvairatham ati amarṣaṇam pracaṇḍa vaktram na babhāja kaścana

original: BhP_07.08.035/1 niśāmya lokatrayamastakajvaraṃ tamādidaityaṃ hariṇā hataṃ mṛdhe
analyzed: niśāmya lokatraya mastaka jvaram tam ādidaityam hariṇā hatam mṛdhe
praharṣa vega utkalita ānanāḥ muhur prasūna varṣaiḥ vavṛṣuḥ sura striyaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.036/1 tadā vimānāvalibhirnabhastalaṃ didṛkṣatāṃ saṅkulamāsa nākinām
analyzed: tadā vimāna āvalibhiḥ nabhastalam didṛkṣatām saṅkulam āsa nākinām

original: BhP_07.08.036/2 surānakā dundubhayo 'tha jaghnire gandharvamukhyā nanṛturjaguḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: sura ānakāḥ dundubhayaḥ jaghnire gandharva mukhyāḥ nanṛtuḥ jaguḥ striyaḥ
tatra upavrajya vibudhāḥ brahma indra giriśa ādayaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ pitaraḥ siddhāḥ vidyādhara mahā uragāḥ
manavaḥ prajānām patayaḥ gandharva apsara cāraṇāḥ
yakṣāḥ kimpuruṣāḥ tāta vetālāḥ saha kinnarāḥ
te viṣṇu pārṣadāḥ sarve sunanda kumuda ādayaḥ
mūrdhni baddhāñjali puṭāḥ āsīnam tīvra tejasam
īḍire nara śārdulam na ati dūra carāḥ pṛthak
śrī brahmā uvāca
nataḥ smi anantāya duranta śaktaye vicitra vīryāya pavitra karmaṇe

original: BhP_07.08.040/2 viśvasya sargasthitisaṃyamān guṇaiḥ svalīlayā sandadhate 'vyayātmane
analyzed: viśvasya sarga sthiti saṃyamān guṇaiḥ sva līlayā sandadhate vyaya ātmane
śrī rudraḥ uvāca
kopa kālaḥ yuga antaḥ te hataḥ yama suraḥ lpakaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.041/2 tatsutaṃ pāhyupasṛtaṃ bhaktaṃ te bhaktavatsala
analyzed: tad sutam pāhi upasṛtam bhaktam te bhakta vatsala
uvāca

original: BhP_07.08.042/1 pratyānītāḥ parama bhavatā trāyatā naḥ svabhāgā
analyzed: pratyānītāḥ parama bhavatā trāyatā naḥ svabhāgā
daitya ākrāntam hṛdaya kamalam tat gṛham pratyabodhi

original: BhP_07.08.042/3 kālagrastaṃ kiyadidamaho nātha śuśrūṣatāṃ te
analyzed: kāla grastam kiyat idam aho nātha śuśrūṣatām te

original: BhP_07.08.042/4 muktisteṣāṃ na hi bahumatā nārasiṃhāparaiḥ kim
analyzed: muktiḥ teṣām na hi bahu matā nārasiṃha aparaiḥ kim
śrī ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
tvam naḥ tapaḥ paramam āttha yat ātma tejaḥ
yena idam ādi puruṣa ātma gatam sasarktha
tat vipraluptam amunā adya śaraṇya pāla
rakṣā gṛhīta vapuṣā punar anvamaṃsthāḥ
śrī pitaraḥ ūcuḥ
śrāddhāni naḥ prasabham tanūjaiḥ
dattāni tīrtha samaye pyapibat tila ambu
tasya udarāt nakha vidīrṇa vapādyaḥ ārcchat
tasmai namaḥ nṛharaye khila dharma goptre
śrī siddhāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.045/1 yo no gatiṃ yogasiddhāmasādhur ahārṣīdyogatapobalena
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ gatim yoga siddhām asādhuḥ ahārṣīt yoga tapaḥ balena

original: BhP_07.08.045/2 nānā darpaṃ taṃ nakhairvidadāra tasmai tubhyaṃ praṇatāḥ smo nṛsiṃha
analyzed: nānā darpam tam nakhaiḥ vidadāra tasmai tubhyam praṇatāḥ smaḥ nṛsiṃha
śrī vidyādharāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.046/1 vidyāṃ pṛthag dhāraṇayānurāddhāṃ nyaṣedhadajño balavīryadṛptaḥ
analyzed: vidyām pṛthak dhāraṇayā anurāddhām nyaṣedhat ajñaḥ bala vīrya dṛptaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.046/2 sa yena saṅkhye paśuvaddhatastaṃ māyānṛsiṃhaṃ praṇatāḥ sma nityam
analyzed: sa yena saṅkhye paśu vat hataḥ tam māyā nṛsiṃham praṇatāḥ sma nityam
śrī nāgāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.047/1 yena pāpena ratnāni strīratnāni hṛtāni naḥ
analyzed: yena pāpena ratnāni strī ratnāni hṛtāni naḥ
tad vakṣaḥ pāṭanena āsām datta ānanda namaḥ stu te
śrī manavaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.048/1 manavo vayaṃ tava nideśakāriṇo ditijena deva paribhūtasetavaḥ
analyzed: manavaḥ vayam tava nideśa kāriṇaḥ ditijena deva paribhūta setavaḥ

original: BhP_07.08.048/2 bhavatā khalaḥ sa upasaṃhṛtaḥ prabho karavāma te kimanuśādhi kiṅkarān
analyzed: bhavatā khalaḥ saḥ upasaṃhṛtaḥ prabho karavāma te kim anuśādhi kiṅkarān
śrī prajāpatayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.049/1 prajeśā vayaṃ te pareśābhisṛṣṭā na yena prajā vai sṛjāmo niṣiddhāḥ
analyzed: prajā īśāḥ vayam te pareśa abhisṛṣṭāḥ na yena prajāḥ vai sṛjāmaḥ niṣiddhāḥ

original: BhP_07.08.049/2 sa eṣa tvayā bhinnavakṣā nu śete jaganmaṅgalaṃ sattvamūrte 'vatāraḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa tvayā bhinna vakṣāḥ nu śete jagat maṅgalam sattva mūrte vatāraḥ
śrī gandharvāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.050/1 vayaṃ vibho te naṭanāṭyagāyakā yenātmasādvīryabalaujasā kṛtāḥ
analyzed: vayam vibho te naṭa nāṭya gāyakāḥ yena ātmasāt vīrya bala ojasā kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_07.08.050/2 sa eṣa nīto bhavatā daśāmimāṃ kimutpathasthaḥ kuśalāya kalpate
analyzed: saḥ eṣa nītaḥ bhavatā daśām imām kim utpatha sthaḥ kuśalāya kalpate
śrī cāraṇāḥ ūcuḥ
hare tava aṅghri paṅkajam bhava apavargam āśritāḥ
yat eṣa sādhu hṛd śayaḥ tvayā asuraḥ samāpitaḥ
śrī yakṣāḥ ūcuḥ
vayam anucara mukhyāḥ karmabhiḥ te manojñaiḥ

original: BhP_07.08.052/2 ta iha ditisutena prāpitā vāhakatvam
analyzed: te iha ditisutena prāpitāḥ vāhaka tvam

original: BhP_07.08.052/3 sa tu janaparitāpaṃ tatkṛtaṃ jānatā te
analyzed: sa tu jana paritāpam tad kṛtam jānatā te
naraharaḥ upanītaḥ pañcatām pañcaviṃśa
śrī kimpuruṣāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.053/1 vayaṃ kimpuruṣāstvaṃ tu mahāpuruṣa īśvaraḥ
analyzed: vayam kimpuruṣāḥ tvam tu mahāpuruṣaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_07.08.053/2 ayaṃ kupuruṣo naṣṭo dhikkṛtaḥ sādhubhiryadā
analyzed: ayam kupuruṣaḥ naṣṭaḥ dhikkṛtaḥ sādhubhiḥ yadā
śrī vaitālikāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.054/1 sabhāsu satreṣu tavāmalaṃ yaśo gītvā saparyāṃ mahatīṃ labhāmahe
analyzed: sabhāsu satreṣu tava amalam yaśaḥ gītvā saparyām mahatīm labhāmahe

original: BhP_07.08.054/2 yastāmanaiṣīdvaśameṣa durjano dviṣṭyā hataste bhagavan yathāmayaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tām anaiṣīt vaśam eṣa durjanaḥ dviṣṭyā hataḥ te bhagavan yathā āmayaḥ
śrī kinnarāḥ ūcuḥ
vayam īśa kinnara gaṇāḥ tava anugāḥ ditijena viṣṭim amunā anukāritāḥ

original: BhP_07.08.055/2 bhavatā hare sa vṛjino 'vasādito narasiṃha nātha vibhavāya no bhava
analyzed: bhavatā hare sa vṛjinaḥ vasa āditas narasiṃha nātha vibhavāya naḥ bhava
śrī viṣṇu pārṣadāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_07.08.056/1 adyaitaddharinararūpamadbhutaṃ te dṛṣṭaṃ naḥ śaraṇada sarvalokaśarma
analyzed: adyā etat hari nara rūpam adbhutam te dṛṣṭam naḥ śaraṇa da sarva loka śarma

original: BhP_07.08.056/2 so 'yaṃ te vidhikara īśa vipraśaptas tasyedaṃ nidhanamanugrahāya vidmaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam te vidhikaraḥ īśa vipraśaptaḥ tasya idam nidhanam anugrahāya vidmaḥ
uvāca

original: BhP_07.09.001/1 evaṃ surādayaḥ sarve brahmarudrapuraḥ sarāḥ
analyzed: evam sura ādayaḥ sarve brahma rudra puras sarāḥ
na upaitum aśakat manyu saṃrambham su durāsadam

original: BhP_07.09.002/1 sākṣāt śrīḥ preṣitā devairdṛṣṭvā taṃ mahadadbhutam
analyzed: sākṣāt śrīḥ preṣitā devaiḥ dṛṣṭvā tam mahat adbhutam
a dṛṣṭa a śruta pūrva tvāt sā nā upeyāya śaṅkitā
prahrādam preṣayāmāsa brahma avasthitam antike

original: BhP_07.09.003/2 tāta praśamayopehi svapitre kupitaṃ prabhum
analyzed: tāta praśamaya upehi sva pitre kupitam prabhum
tathā iti śanakais rājan mahā bhāgavataḥ ṛbhakaḥ

original: BhP_07.09.004/2 upetya bhuvi kāyena nanāma vidhṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: upetya bhuvi kāyena nanāma vidhṛta añjaliḥ

original: BhP_07.09.005/1 svapādamūle patitaṃ tamarbhakaṃ vilokya devaḥ kṛpayā pariplutaḥ
analyzed: sva pāda mūle patitam tam arbhakam vilokya devaḥ kṛpayā pariplutaḥ

original: BhP_07.09.005/2 utthāpya tacchīrṣṇyadadhāt karāmbujaṃ kālāhivitrastadhiyāṃ kṛtābhayam
analyzed: utthāpya tad śīrṣṇi adadhāt kara ambujam kāla ahi vitrasta dhiyām kṛta abhayam
sa tad kara sparśa dhuta akhila aśubhaḥ sapadi abhivyakta parātma darśanaḥ

original: BhP_07.09.006/2 tatpādapadmaṃ hṛdi nirvṛto dadhau hṛṣyattanuḥ klinnahṛdaśrulocanaḥ
analyzed: tad pāda padmam hṛdi nirvṛtaḥ hṛṣyat tanuḥ klinna hṛd aśru locanaḥ
astauṣīt harim ekāgra manasā su samāhitaḥ
prema gadgadayā vācā tad nyasta hṛdaya īkṣaṇaḥ
śrī prahrādaḥ uvāca
brahma ādayaḥ sura gaṇāḥ munayaḥ siddhāḥ
sattva ekatāna gatayaḥ vacasām pravāhaiḥ
na ārādhitum puru guṇaiḥ adhunā api pipruḥ

original: BhP_07.09.008/4 kiṃ toṣṭumarhati sa me harirugrajāteḥ
analyzed: kim toṣṭum arhati sa me hariḥ ugra jāteḥ
manye dhana abhijana rūpa tapaḥ śruta ojaḥ
tejaḥ prabhāva bala pauruṣa buddhi yogāḥ

original: BhP_07.09.009/3 nārādhanāya hi bhavanti parasya puṃso
analyzed: na ārādhanāya hi bhavanti parasya puṃsaḥ
bhaktyā tutoṣa bhagavān gaja yūthapāya
viprāt dvi ṣaḍguṇa yutāt aravindanābha
pāda aravinda vimukhāt śvapacam variṣṭham
manye tad arpita manaḥ vacana īhita artha

original: BhP_07.09.010/4 prāṇaṃ punāti sa kulaṃ na tu bhūrimānaḥ
analyzed: prāṇam punāti sa kulam na tu bhūri mānaḥ
na eva ātmanaḥ prabhuḥ ayam nija lābha pūrṇaḥ
mānam janāt a viduṣaḥ karuṇaḥ vṛṇīte

original: BhP_07.09.011/3 yadyaj jano bhagavate vidadhīta mānaṃ
analyzed: yat yat janaḥ bhagavate vidadhīta mānam

original: BhP_07.09.011/4 tac cātmane pratimukhasya yathā mukhaśrīḥ
analyzed: tat ca ātmane pratimukhasya yathā mukha śrīḥ
tasmāt aham vigata viklavaḥ īśvarasya

original: BhP_07.09.012/2 sarvātmanā mahi gṛṇāmi yathā manīṣam
analyzed: sarva ātmanā mahi gṛṇāmi yathā manīṣam
nīcaḥ jayā guṇa visargam anupraviṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_07.09.012/4 pūyeta yena hi pumān anuvarṇitena
analyzed: pūyeta yena hi pumān anuvarṇitena
sarve hi amī vidhi karāḥ tava sattva dhāmnaḥ
brahma ādayaḥ vayam iva īśa na ca udvijantaḥ
kṣemāya bhūtaye uta ātma sukhāya ca asya
vikrīḍitam bhagavataḥ rucira avatāraiḥ
tat yaccha manyum asuraḥ ca hataḥ tvayā adya
modeta sādhuḥ api vṛścika sarpa hatyā
lokāḥ ca nirvṛti mitāḥ pratiyanti sarve

original: BhP_07.09.014/4 rūpaṃ nṛsiṃha vibhayāya janāḥ smaranti
analyzed: rūpam nṛsiṃha vibhayāya janāḥ smaranti
na aham bibhemi ajita te ti bhayānakā asya
āntra srajaḥ kṣataja kesara śaṅku karṇān
nirhrāda bhīta diś ibhāt ari bhinna kha agrāt
trastaḥ smi aham kṛpaṇa vatsala duḥsaha ugra
saṃsāra cakra kadanāt grasatām praṇītaḥ
baddhaḥ sva karmabhiḥ uśattama te ṅghri mūlam
prītaḥ u pavarga śaraṇam hvayase kadā nu
śoka agninā sakala yoniṣu dahyamānaḥ
duḥkha auṣadham tat api duḥkham a tad dhiyā aham

original: BhP_07.09.017/4 bhūman bhramāmi vada me tava dāsyayogam
analyzed: bhūman bhramāmi vada me tava dāsya yogam
saḥ ham priyasya suhṛdaḥ para devatāyā
līlā kathāḥ tava nṛsiṃha viriñca gītāḥ
añjas titarmi anugṛṇan guṇa vipramuktaḥ
durgāṇi te pada yuga ālaya haṃsa saṅgaḥ

original: BhP_07.09.019/1 bālasya neha śaraṇaṃ pitarau nṛsiṃha
analyzed: bālasya nā iha śaraṇam pitarau nṛsiṃha
na ārtasya ca agadam udanvati majjataḥ nauḥ
taptasya tad pratividhiḥ yaḥ iha añjasā iṣṭaḥ
tāvat vibho tanubhṛtām tvad upekṣitānām

original: BhP_07.09.020/1 yasmin yato yarhi yena ca yasya yasmād
analyzed: yasmin yatas yarhi yena ca yasya yasmāt

original: BhP_07.09.020/2 yasmai yathā yaduta yastvaparaḥ paro vā
analyzed: yasmai yathā yat uta yaḥ tu aparaḥ paraḥ vā

original: BhP_07.09.020/3 bhāvaḥ karoti vikaroti pṛthak svabhāvaḥ
analyzed: bhāvaḥ karoti vikaroti pṛthak svabhāvaḥ
sañcoditaḥ tat akhilam bhavataḥ sva rūpam

original: BhP_07.09.021/1 māyā manaḥ sṛjati karmamayaṃ balīyaḥ
analyzed: māyā manaḥ sṛjati karma mayam balīyaḥ
kālena ca udita guṇa anumatena puṃsaḥ
chandaḥ mayam yat ajayā arpita ṣoḍaśa aram
saṃsāra cakram aja kaḥ titaret tvad anyaḥ

original: BhP_07.09.022/1 sa tvaṃ hi nityavijitātmaguṇaḥ svadhāmnā
analyzed: sa tvam hi nitya vijita ātma guṇaḥ sva dhāmnā
cakre visṛṣṭam ajaya īśvara ṣoḍaśāre
niṣpīḍyamānam upakarṣa vibho prapannam
dṛṣṭāḥ mayā divi vibho khila dhiṣṇyapānām

original: BhP_07.09.023/2 āyuḥ śriyo vibhava icchati yān jano 'yam
analyzed: āyuḥ śriyaḥ vibhavaḥ icchati yān janaḥ yam
ye smat pituḥ kupita hāsa vijṛmbhita bhrū

original: BhP_07.09.023/4 visphūrjitena lulitāḥ sa tu te nirastaḥ
analyzed: visphūrjitena lulitāḥ sa tu te nirastaḥ
tasmāt amūḥ tanubhṛtām aham āśiṣaḥ jña
āyuḥ śriyam vibhavam aindriyam ā viriñcyāt
na icchāmi te vilulitān uru vikrameṇa
kāla ātmanā upanaya mām nija bhṛtya pārśvam
kutra āśiṣaḥ śruti sukhāḥ mṛgatṛṣṇi rūpāḥ
kva idam kalevaram aśeṣa rujām virohaḥ

original: BhP_07.09.025/3 nirvidyate na tu jano yadapīti vidvān
analyzed: nirvidyate na tu janaḥ yat api iti vidvān
kāma analam madhu lavaiḥ śamayan durāpaiḥ
kva aham rajaḥ prabhave īśa tamaḥ dhike smin
jātaḥ suretara kule kva tava anukampā

original: BhP_07.09.026/3 na brahmaṇo na tu bhavasya na vai ramāyā
analyzed: na brahmaṇaḥ na tu bhavasya na vai ramāyā

original: BhP_07.09.026/4 yan me 'rpitaḥ śirasi padmakaraḥ prasādaḥ
analyzed: yat me rpitaḥ śirasi padmakaraḥ prasādaḥ
na eṣā parāvara matiḥ bhavataḥ nanu syāt
jantoḥ yathā ātma suhṛdaḥ jagataḥ tathā api
saṃsevayā sura taroḥ iva te prasādaḥ
sevā anurūpam udayaḥ na parāvara tvam
evam janam nipatitam prabhava ahi kūpe
kāma abhikāmam anu yaḥ prapatan prasaṅgāt
kṛtvā ātmasāt sura ṛṣiṇā bhagavan gṛhītaḥ

original: BhP_07.09.028/4 so 'haṃ kathaṃ nu visṛje tava bhṛtyasevām
analyzed: saḥ ham katham nu visṛje tava bhṛtya sevām
mad prāṇa rakṣaṇam ananta pituḥ vadhaḥ ca
manye sva bhṛtya ṛṣi vākya mṛtam vidhātum
khaḍgam pragṛhya yat avocat asat vidhitsuḥ
tvām īśvaraḥ mad aparaḥ vatu kam harāmi
ekaḥ tvam eva jagat etam amuṣya yat tvam
ādi antayoḥ pṛthak avasyasi madhyataḥ ca
sṛṣṭvā guṇa vyatikaram nija māyayā idam
nānā iva taiḥ avasitaḥ tad anupraviṣṭaḥ
tvam vai idam sat asat īśa bhavān tatas
māyā yat ātma para buddhiḥ iyam hi apārthā

original: BhP_07.09.031/3 yadyasya janma nidhanaṃ sthitirīkṣaṇaṃ ca
analyzed: yat yasya janma nidhanam sthitiḥ īkṣaṇam ca
tat vā etat eva vasu kālavat aṣṭi tarvoḥ
nyasya idam ātmani jagat vilaya ambu madhye
yogena

original: BhP_07.09.032/4 turye sthito na tu tamo na guṇāṃśca yuṅkṣe
analyzed: turye sthitaḥ na tu tamaḥ na guṇān ca yuṅkṣe
tasya eva te vapuḥ idam nija kāla śaktyā
sañcodita prakṛti dharmaṇaḥ ātma gūḍham
ambhasi ananta śayanāt viramat samādheḥ
nābheḥ abhūt sva kaṇikā vaṭa vat mahā abjam
tad sambhavaḥ kaviḥ atas

original: BhP_07.09.034/2 tvāṃ bījamātmani tataṃ sa bahirvicintya
analyzed: tvām bījam ātmani tatam sa bahis vicintya
na avindat abda śatam apsu nimajjamānaḥ
jāte ṅkure bījam
sa tu ātmayoniḥ ati vismitaḥ āśritaḥ bjam
kālena tīvra tapasā pariśuddha bhāvaḥ
tvām ātmani īśa bhuvi gandham iva ati sūkṣmam
bhūta indriya āśaya maye vitatam dadarśa
evam sahasra vadana aṅghri śiraḥ kara ūru
nāsādya karṇa nayana ābharaṇa āyudha āḍhyam
māyā mayam sat upalakṣita sanniveśam
dṛṣṭvā mahāpuruṣam āpa mudam viriñcaḥ

original: BhP_07.09.037/1 tasmai bhavān hayaśirastanuvaṃ hi bibhrad
analyzed: tasmai bhavān haya śiraḥ tanuvam hi bibhrat
vedadruhau atibalau madhu kaiṭabha ākhyau
hatvā anayat śruti gaṇān ca rajaḥ tamaḥ ca
sattvam tava priyatamām tanum āmananti
ittham nṛ tiryak ṛṣi deva jhaṣa avatāraiḥ

original: BhP_07.09.038/2 lokān vibhāvayasi haṃsi jagat pratīpān
analyzed: lokān vibhāvayasi haṃsi jagat pratīpān
dharmam mahāpuruṣa pāsi yuga anuvṛttam

original: BhP_07.09.038/4 channaḥ kalau yadabhavastriyugo 'tha sa tvam
analyzed: channaḥ kalau sa tvam
na etat manaḥ tava kathāsu vikuṇṭha nātha
samprīyate durita duṣṭam asādhu tīvram
kāma āturam harṣa śoka bhaya eṣaṇā ārtam

original: BhP_07.09.039/4 tasmin kathaṃ tava gatiṃ vimṛśāmi dīnaḥ
analyzed: tasmin katham tava gatim vimṛśāmi dīnaḥ
cyuta vikarṣati mā a vitṛptā
śiśnaḥ nyatas tvac udaram śravaṇam kutaścid
ghrāṇaḥ nyataḥ capala dṛś kva ca karma śaktiḥ

original: BhP_07.09.040/4 bahvyaḥ sapatnya iva gehapatiṃ lunanti
analyzed: bahvyaḥ sapatnyaḥ iva gehapatim lunanti
evam sva karma patitam bhava vaitaraṇyām
anyonya janma maraṇa aśana bhīta bhītam
paśyan janam sva para vigraha vaira maitram
hanta iti pāra cara pīpṛhi mūḍham adya

original: BhP_07.09.042/1 ko nvatra te 'khilaguro bhagavan prayāsa
analyzed: kaḥ nu atra te khila guro bhagavan prayāsa
uttāraṇe sya bhava sambhava lopa hetoḥ
mūḍheṣu vai mahat anugrahaḥ ārta bandho

original: BhP_07.09.042/4 kiṃ tena te priyajanān anusevatāṃ naḥ
analyzed: kim tena te priya janān anusevatām naḥ
na eva udvije para duratyaya vaitaraṇyāḥ
tvad vīrya gāyana mahā amṛta magna cittaḥ
śoce tatas vimukha cetasaḥ indriya artha
māyā sukhāya bharam udvahataḥ vimūḍhān
prāyeṇa deva munayaḥ sva vimukti kāmā

original: BhP_07.09.044/2 maunaṃ caranti vijane na parārthaniṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: maunam caranti vijane na para artha niṣṭhāḥ

original: BhP_07.09.044/3 naitān vihāya kṛpaṇān vimumukṣa eko
analyzed: na etān vihāya kṛpaṇān vimumukṣe ekaḥ
na anyam tvat asya śaraṇam bhramataḥ nu paśye
yat maithuna ādi gṛhamedhi sukham hi tuccham
kaṇḍūyanena karayoḥ iva duḥkha duḥkham
tṛpyanti na iha kṛpaṇāḥ bahu duḥkha bhājaḥ
kaṇḍūti vat manasijam viṣaheta dhīraḥ
mauna vrata śruta tapaḥ dhyā ayana svadharma
vyākhyā rahaḥ japa samādhayaḥ āpavargyāḥ

original: BhP_07.09.046/3 prāyaḥ paraṃ puruṣa te tvajitendriyāṇāṃ
analyzed: prāyas param puruṣa te tu ajita indriyāṇām

original: BhP_07.09.046/4 vārtā bhavantyuta na vātra tu dāmbhikānām
analyzed: vārtāḥ bhavanti uta na vā atra tu dāmbhikānām

original: BhP_07.09.047/1 rūpe ime sadasatī tava vedasṛṣṭe
analyzed: rūpe ime sat asatī tava veda sṛṣṭe
bīja aṅkurau iva na ca anyat arūpakasya
yuktāḥ samakṣam ubhayatra vicakṣante tvām

original: BhP_07.09.047/4 yogena vahnimiva dāruṣu nānyataḥ syāt
analyzed: yogena vahnim iva dāruṣu na anyatas syāt
tvam vāyuḥ agniḥ avaniḥ viyat ambu mātrāḥ
prāṇa indriyāṇi hṛdayam cit anugrahaḥ ca

original: BhP_07.09.048/3 sarvaṃ tvameva saguṇo viguṇaśca bhūman
analyzed: sarvam tvam eva saguṇaḥ viguṇaḥ ca bhūman
na anyat tvat asti api manaḥ vacasā niruktam

original: BhP_07.09.049/1 naite guṇā na guṇino mahadādayo ye
analyzed: na ete guṇāḥ na guṇinaḥ mahat ādayaḥ ye
sarve manaḥ prabhṛtayaḥ sahadeva martyāḥ

original: BhP_07.09.049/3 ādyantavanta urugāya vidanti hi tvām
analyzed: ādi antavantaḥ urugāya vidanti hi tvām

original: BhP_07.09.049/4 evaṃ vimṛśya sudhiyo viramanti śabdāt
analyzed: evam vimṛśya sudhiyaḥ viramanti śabdāt
tat te rhattama namaḥ stuti karma pūjāḥ
karma smṛtiḥ caraṇayoḥ śravaṇam kathāyām

original: BhP_07.09.050/3 saṃsevayā tvayi vineti ṣaḍaṅgayā kiṃ
analyzed: saṃsevayā tvayi vinā iti ṣaḍaṅgayā kim
bhaktim janaḥ paramahaṃsa gatau labheta

original: BhP_07.09.052/1 prahrāda bhadra bhadraṃ te prīto 'haṃ te 'surottama
analyzed: prahrāda bhadra bhadram te prītaḥ ham te sura uttama

original: BhP_07.09.053/1 māmaprīṇata āyuṣman darśanaṃ durlabhaṃ hi me

original: BhP_07.09.053/2 dṛṣṭvā māṃ na punarjanturātmānaṃ taptumarhati
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā mām na punar jantuḥ ātmānam taptum arhati

original: BhP_07.09.054/1 prīṇanti hyatha māṃ dhīrāḥ sarvabhāvena sādhavaḥ
analyzed: prīṇanti hi atha mām dhīrāḥ sarva bhāvena sādhavaḥ

śrī prahrādaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_07.10.002/1 mā māṃ pralobhayotpattyā saktaṃkāmeṣu tairvaraiḥ

bhṛtya lakṣaṇa jijñāsuḥ bhaktam kāmeṣu acodayat
bhavān saṃsāra bījeṣu hṛdaya granthiṣu prabho
na anyathā te khila guro ghaṭeta karuṇa ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.004/2 yasta āśiṣa āśāste na sa bhṛtyaḥ sa vai vaṇik
analyzed: yaḥ te āśiṣaḥ āśāste na sa bhṛtyaḥ sa vai vaṇij

original: BhP_07.10.005/1 āśāsāno na vai bhṛtyaḥ svāminyāśiṣa ātmanaḥ
analyzed: āśāsānaḥ na vai bhṛtyaḥ svāmini āśiṣaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.005/2 na svāmī bhṛtyataḥ svāmyamicchan yo rāti cāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: na svāmī bhṛtyataḥ svāmyam icchan yaḥ rāti ca āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.007/1 yadi dāsyasi me kāmān varāṃstvaṃ varadarṣabha
analyzed: yadi dāsyasi me kāmān varān tvam vara da ṛṣabha

original: BhP_07.10.007/2 kāmānāṃ hṛdyasaṃrohaṃ bhavatastu vṛṇe varam
analyzed: kāmānām hṛdi asaṃroham bhavataḥ tu vṛṇe varam

original: BhP_07.10.008/1 indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇa ātmā dharmo dhṛtirmatiḥ
analyzed: indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇaḥ ātmā dharmaḥ dhṛtiḥ matiḥ

original: BhP_07.10.008/2 hrīḥ śrīstejaḥ smṛtiḥ satyaṃ yasya naśyanti janmanā
analyzed: hrīḥ śrīḥ tejaḥ smṛtiḥ satyam yasya naśyanti janmanā

original: BhP_07.10.009/1 vimuñcati yadā kāmān mānavo manasi sthitān
analyzed: vimuñcati yadā kāmān mānavaḥ manasi sthitān

original: BhP_07.10.010/1 oṃ namo bhagavate tubhyaṃ puruṣāya mahātmane

haraye dbhuta siṃhāya brahmaṇe paramātmane
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_07.10.011/1 naikāntino me mayi jātvihāśiṣa āśāsate 'mutra ca ye bhavadvidhāḥ
analyzed: na ekāntinaḥ me mayi jātu iha āśiṣaḥ āśāsate mutra ca ye bhavadvidhāḥ
tathā api manvantaram etat atra daitya īśvarāṇām anubhuṅkṣva bhogān

original: BhP_07.10.012/1 kathā madīyā juṣamāṇaḥ priyāstvam āveśya māmātmani santamekam

original: BhP_07.10.012/2 sarveṣu bhūteṣvadhiyajñamīśaṃ yajasva yogena ca karma hinvan
analyzed: sarveṣu bhūteṣu adhiyajñam īśam yajasva yogena ca karma hinvan

original: BhP_07.10.013/1 bhogena puṇyaṃ kuśalena pāpaṃ kalevaraṃ kālajavena hitvā
analyzed: bhogena puṇyam kuśalena pāpam kalevaram kāla javena hitvā

original: BhP_07.10.013/2 kīrtiṃ viśuddhāṃ suralokagītāṃ vitāya māmeṣyasi muktabandhaḥ
analyzed: kīrtim viśuddhām sura loka gītām vitāya mām eṣyasi mukta bandhaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.014/1 ya etat kīrtayen mahyaṃ tvayā gītamidaṃ naraḥ

original: BhP_07.10.014/2 tvāṃ ca māṃ ca smaran kāle karmabandhāt pramucyate
analyzed: tvām ca mām ca smaran kāle karma bandhāt pramucyate
śrī prahrādaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_07.10.015/1 varaṃ varaya etat te varadeśān maheśvara
analyzed: varam varaye etat te vara deśāt maheśvara

original: BhP_07.10.015/2 yadanindat pitā me tvāmavidvāṃsteja aiśvaram
analyzed: yat anindat pitā me tvām avidvān tejaḥ aiśvaram

bhrātṛ hā iti mṛṣā dṛṣṭiḥ tvad bhakte mayi ca aghavān

original: BhP_07.10.017/1 tasmāt pitā me pūyeta durantāddustarādaghāt
analyzed: tasmāt pitā me pūyeta durantāt dustarāt aghāt
pūtaḥ te pāṅga saṃdṛṣṭaḥ tadā kṛpaṇa vatsala
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_07.10.018/1 triḥsaptabhiḥ pitā pūtaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha te 'nagha
analyzed: triḥsaptabhiḥ pitā pūtaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha te nagha

original: BhP_07.10.018/2 yat sādho 'sya kule jāto bhavān vai kulapāvanaḥ
analyzed: yat sādho sya kule jātaḥ bhavān vai kula pāvanaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.019/1 yatra yatra ca madbhaktāḥ praśāntāḥ samadarśinaḥ
analyzed: yatra yatra ca mad bhaktāḥ praśāntāḥ sama darśinaḥ
sādhavaḥ samudācārāḥ te pūyante kīkaṭāḥ

original: BhP_07.10.020/1 sarvātmanā na hiṃsanti bhūtagrāmeṣu kiñcana
analyzed: sarva ātmanā na hiṃsanti bhūta grāmeṣu kiñcana
uccāvaceṣu daitya indra mad bhāva vigata spṛhāḥ
bhavanti puruṣāḥ loke mad bhaktāḥ tvām anuvratāḥ

original: BhP_07.10.021/2 bhavān me khalu bhaktānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pratirūpadhṛk
analyzed: bhavān me khalu bhaktānām sarveṣām pratirūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_07.10.022/1 kuru tvaṃ pretakṛtyāni pituḥ pūtasya sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: kuru tvam preta kṛtyāni pituḥ pūtasya sarvaśas
mad aṅga sparśanena aṅga lokān yāsyati suprajāḥ

original: BhP_07.10.023/1 pitryaṃ ca sthānamātiṣṭha yathoktaṃ brahmavādibhiḥ
analyzed: pitryam ca sthānam ātiṣṭha yathā uktam brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_07.10.023/2 mayyāveśya manastāta kuru karmāṇi matparaḥ
analyzed: mayi āveśya manaḥ tāta kuru karmāṇi mad paraḥ
uvāca

original: BhP_07.10.024/1 prahrādo 'pi tathā cakre pituryat sāmparāyikam
analyzed: prahrādaḥ pi tathā cakre pituḥ yat sāmparāyikam
yathā āha bhagavān rājan abhiṣiktaḥ dvijātibhiḥ

original: BhP_07.10.025/1 prasādasumukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmā narahariṃ harim
analyzed: prasāda su mukham dṛṣṭvā brahmā naraharim harim

original: BhP_07.10.025/2 stutvā vāgbhiḥ pavitrābhiḥ prāha devādibhirvṛtaḥ
analyzed: stutvā vāgbhiḥ pavitrābhiḥ prāha deva ādibhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.026/2 diṣṭyā te nihataḥ pāpo lokasantāpano 'suraḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā te nihataḥ pāpaḥ loka santāpano suraḥ

original: BhP_07.10.027/1 yo 'sau labdhavaro matto na vadhyo mama sṛṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sau labdha varaḥ mattaḥ na vadhyaḥ mama sṛṣṭibhiḥ

diṣṭyā tad tanayaḥ sādhuḥ mahā bhāgavataḥ ṛbhakaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.028/2 tvayā vimocito mṛtyordiṣṭyā tvāṃ samito 'dhunā
analyzed: tvayā vimocitaḥ mṛtyoḥ diṣṭyā tvām samitaḥ dhunā

original: BhP_07.10.029/2 sarvato goptṛ santrāsān mṛtyorapi jighāṃsataḥ
analyzed: sarvatas goptṛ santrāsāt mṛtyoḥ api jighāṃsataḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_07.10.030/1 maivaṃ vibho 'surāṇāṃ te pradeyaḥ padmasambhava
analyzed: mā evam vibho surāṇām te pradeyaḥ padmasambhava
varaḥ krūra nisargāṇām ahīnām amṛtam yathā

original: BhP_07.10.032/2 bhavaṃ prajāpatīn devān prahrādo bhagavatkalāḥ
analyzed: bhavam prajāpatīn devān prahrādaḥ bhagavat kalāḥ

original: BhP_07.10.033/1 tataḥ kāvyādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ munibhiḥ kamalāsanaḥ
analyzed: tatas kāvya ādibhiḥ sārdham munibhiḥ kamalāsanaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.033/2 daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca prahrādamakarot patim

analyzed: pratinandya tatas devāḥ prayujya parama āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.034/2 svadhāmāni yayū rājan brahmādyāḥ pratipūjitāḥ
analyzed: sva dhāmāni yayuḥ rājan brahma ādyāḥ pratipūjitāḥ

original: BhP_07.10.035/1 evaṃ ca pārṣadau viṣṇoḥ putratvaṃ prāpitau diteḥ
analyzed: evam ca pārṣadau viṣṇoḥ putra tvam prāpitau diteḥ

original: BhP_07.10.035/2 hṛdi sthitena hariṇā vairabhāvena tau hatau
analyzed: hṛdi sthitena hariṇā vaira bhāvena tau hatau

original: BhP_07.10.036/1 punaśca vipraśāpena rākṣasau tau babhūvatuḥ
analyzed: punar ca vipra śāpena rākṣasau tau babhūvatuḥ

original: BhP_07.10.037/1 śayānau yudhi nirbhinna hṛdayau rāmaśāyakaiḥ
analyzed: śayānau yudhi nirbhinna hṛdayau rāma śāyakaiḥ

harau vaira anubandhena paśyataḥ te samīyatuḥ

original: BhP_07.10.039/1 enaḥ pūrvakṛtaṃ yat tadrājānaḥ kṛṣṇavairiṇaḥ
analyzed: enaḥ pūrva kṛtam yat tat rājānaḥ kṛṣṇa vairiṇaḥ

original: BhP_07.10.039/2 jahuste 'nte tadātmānaḥ kīṭaḥ peśaskṛto yathā
analyzed: jahuḥ te n te tad ātmānaḥ kīṭaḥ peśaskṛtaḥ yathā

original: BhP_07.10.040/1 yathā yathā bhagavato bhaktyā paramayābhidā
analyzed: yathā yathā bhagavataḥ bhaktyā paramayā abhidā
nṛpāḥ caidya ādayaḥ sātmyam hareḥ tad cintayā yayuḥ

original: BhP_07.10.041/1 ākhyātaṃ sarvametat te yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛṣṭavān
analyzed: ākhyātam sarvam etat te yat mām tvam paripṛṣṭavān

original: BhP_07.10.042/1 eṣā brahmaṇyadevasya kṛṣṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: eṣā brahmaṇyadevasya kṛṣṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ

analyzed: etat iṣṭam pravṛtta ākhyam hutam prahutam eva ca
dravya sūkṣma vipākaḥ ca dhūmaḥ rātriḥ apakṣayaḥ

original: BhP_07.15.050/2 ayanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ somo darśa oṣadhivīrudhaḥ
analyzed: ayanam dakṣiṇam somaḥ darśaḥ oṣadhi vīrudhaḥ

original: BhP_07.15.051/1 annaṃ reta iti kṣmeśa pitṛyānaṃ punarbhavaḥ
analyzed: annam retaḥ iti kṣmā īśa pitṛyānam punarbhavaḥ
ekaikaśyena anupūrvam bhūtvā bhūtvā iha jāyate
niṣeka ādi śmaśāna antaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ saṃskṛtaḥ dvijaḥ
indriyeṣu kriyā yajñān jñāna dīpeṣu juhvati

original: BhP_07.15.053/1 indriyāṇi manasyūrmau vāci vaikārikaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: indriyāṇi manasi ūrmau vāci vaikārikam manaḥ

original: BhP_07.15.053/2 vācaṃ varṇasamāmnāye tamoṃkāre svare nyaset
analyzed: vācam varṇa samāmnāye tam oṃkāre svare nyaset

original: BhP_07.15.053/3 oṃkāraṃ bindau nāde taṃ taṃ tu prāṇe mahatyamum
analyzed: oṃkāram bindau nāde tam tam tu prāṇe mahati amum

original: BhP_07.15.054/1 agniḥ sūryo divā prāhṇaḥ śuklo rākottaraṃ svarāṭ
analyzed: agniḥ sūryaḥ divā prāhṇaḥ śuklaḥ rākā uttaram svarāj

original: BhP_07.15.054/2 viśvo 'tha taijasaḥ prājñasturya ātmā samanvayāt
analyzed: viśvaḥ tha taijasaḥ prājñaḥ turyaḥ ātmā samanvayāt
deva yānam idam prāhuḥ bhūtvā bhūtvā anupūrvaśas
ātma yājī upaśānta ātmā hi ātma sthaḥ na nivartate
ye ete pitṛ devānām ayane veda nirmite

original: BhP_07.15.056/2 śāstreṇa cakṣuṣā veda janastho 'pi na muhyati
analyzed: śāstreṇa cakṣuṣā veda janasthaḥ pi na muhyati
ādau ante janānām sat bahis antar parāvaram

original: BhP_07.15.057/2 jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vaco vācyaṃ tamo jyotistvayaṃ svayam
analyzed: jñānam jñeyam vacaḥ vācyam tamaḥ jyotiḥ tu ayam svayam

original: BhP_07.15.058/1 ābādhito 'pi hyābhāso yathā vastutayā smṛtaḥ
analyzed: ābādhitaḥ hi ābhāsaḥ yathā vastu tayā smṛtaḥ
durghaṭa tvāt aindriyakam tadvat artha vikalpitam

original: BhP_07.15.059/1 kṣityādīnāmihārthānāṃ chāyā na katamāpi hi
analyzed: kṣiti ādīnām iha arthānām chāyā na katamā api hi

original: BhP_07.15.059/2 na saṅghāto vikāro 'pi na pṛthaṅ nānvito mṛṣā
analyzed: na saṅghātaḥ vikāraḥ na pṛthak na anvitaḥ mṛṣā
dhātavaḥ vayavi tvāt ca tanmātra avayavaiḥ vinā
na syuḥ hi asati avayavini asat avayavaḥ n tataḥ
syāt sādṛśya bhramaḥ tāvat vikalpe sati vastunaḥ

original: BhP_07.15.061/2 jāgratsvāpau yathā svapne tathā vidhiniṣedhatā
analyzed: jāgrat svāpau yathā svapne tathā vidhi niṣedha tā
bhāva advaitam kriyā advaitam dravya advaitam tathā ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_07.15.062/2 vartayan svānubhūtyeha trīn svapnān dhunute muniḥ
analyzed: vartayan sva anubhūtyā iha trīn svapnān dhunute muniḥ
kārya kāraṇa vastu aikya darśanam paṭa tantu vat
avastu tvāt vikalpasya bhāva advaitam tat ucyate
yat brahmaṇi pare sākṣāt sarva karma samarpaṇam
manaḥ vāc tanubhiḥ pārtha kriyā advaitam tat ucyate
ātma jāyā suta ādīnām anyeṣām sarva dehinām
yat svārtha kāmayoḥ aikyam dravya advaitam tat ucyate

original: BhP_07.15.066/1 yadyasya vāniṣiddhaṃ syādyena yatra yato nṛpa
analyzed: yadi asya vā a niṣiddham syāt yena yatra yatas nṛpa

original: BhP_07.15.066/2 sa teneheta kāryāṇi naro nānyairanāpadi
analyzed: sa tena īheta kāryāṇi naraḥ na anyaiḥ anāpadi
etaiḥ anyaiḥ ca veda uktaiḥ vartamānaḥ sva karmabhiḥ
gṛhe pi asya gatim yāyāt rājan tad bhakti bhāj naraḥ

original: BhP_07.15.068/1 yathā hi yūyaṃ nṛpadeva dustyajād āpadgaṇāduttaratātmanaḥ prabhoḥ
analyzed: yathā hi yūyam nṛpa deva dustyajāt āpad gaṇāt uttara tā ātmanaḥ prabhoḥ

original: BhP_07.15.068/2 yatpādapaṅkeruhasevayā bhavān ahāraṣīn nirjitadiggajaḥ kratūn
analyzed: yad pāda paṅkeruha sevayā bhavān ahāraṣīt nirjita diggajaḥ kratūn
aham purā abhavam kaścid gandharvaḥ upabarhaṇaḥ
nāmnā atīte mahā kalpe gandharvāṇām su sammataḥ

original: BhP_07.15.070/2 strīṇāṃ priyatamo nityaṃ mattaḥ svapuralampaṭaḥ
analyzed: strīṇām priyatamaḥ nityam mattaḥ sva pura lampaṭaḥ

original: BhP_07.15.071/1 ekadā devasatre tu gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
analyzed: ekadā deva satre tu gandharva apsarasām gaṇāḥ
upahūtā viśva sṛgbhiḥ hari gāthā upagāyane

original: BhP_07.15.072/1 ahaṃ ca gāyaṃstadvidvān strībhiḥ parivṛto gataḥ
analyzed: aham ca gāyan tad vidvān strībhiḥ parivṛtaḥ gataḥ

original: BhP_07.15.072/2 jñātvā viśvasṛjastan me helanaṃ śepurojasā
analyzed: jñātvā viśvasṛjaḥ tat me helanam śepuḥ ojasā

original: BhP_07.15.072/3 yāhi tvaṃ śūdratāmāśu naṣṭaśrīḥ kṛtahelanaḥ
analyzed: yāhi tvam śūdra tām āśu naṣṭa śrīḥ kṛta helanaḥ
tāvat dāsyām aham jajñe tatra api brahma vādinām
śuśrūṣayā anuṣaṅgeṇa prāptaḥ ham brahma putra tām
dharmaḥ te gṛhamedhīyaḥ varṇitaḥ pāpa nāśanaḥ
gṛhasthaḥ yena padavīm añjasā nyāsinām iyāt

original: BhP_07.15.075/1 yūyaṃ nṛloke bata bhūribhāgā lokaṃ punānā munayo 'bhiyanti
analyzed: yūyam nṛ loke bata bhūri bhāgāḥ lokam punānāḥ munayaḥ bhiyanti

original: BhP_07.15.075/2 yeṣāṃ gṛhān āvasatīti sākṣād gūḍhaṃ paraṃ brahma manuṣyaliṅgam
analyzed: yeṣām gṛhān āvasati iti sākṣāt gūḍham param brahma manuṣya liṅgam

original: BhP_07.15.076/1 sa vā ayaṃ brahma mahadvimṛgya kaivalyanirvāṇasukhānubhūtiḥ
analyzed: sa vai ayam brahma mahat vimṛgya kaivalya nirvāṇa sukha anubhūtiḥ

original: BhP_07.15.076/2 priyaḥ suhṛdvaḥ khalu mātuleya ātmārhaṇīyo vidhikṛdguruśca
analyzed: priyaḥ suhṛd vaḥ khalu mātuleyaḥ ātma arhaṇīyaḥ vidhi kṛt guruḥ ca

original: BhP_07.15.077/1 na yasya sākṣādbhavapadmajādibhī rūpaṃ dhiyā vastutayopavarṇitam
analyzed: na yasya sākṣāt bhava padmaja ādibhiḥ rūpam dhiyā vastu tayā upavarṇitam

original: BhP_07.15.077/2 maunena bhaktyopaśamena pūjitaḥ prasīdatāmeṣa sa sātvatāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: maunena bhaktyā upaśamena pūjitaḥ prasīdatām eṣa sa sātvatām patiḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_07.15.078/1 iti devarṣiṇā proktaṃ niśamya bharatarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: iti deva ṛṣiṇā proktam niśamya bharata ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_07.15.078/2 pūjayāmāsa suprītaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca premavihvalaḥ
analyzed: pūjayāmāsa su prītaḥ kṛṣṇam ca prema vihvalaḥ
kṛṣṇa pārthau upāmantrya pūjitaḥ prayayau muniḥ

original: BhP_07.15.079/2 śrutvā kṛṣṇaṃ paraṃ brahma pārthaḥ paramavismitaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā kṛṣṇam param brahma pārthaḥ parama vismitaḥ

original: BhP_07.15.080/1 iti dākṣāyiṇīnāṃ te pṛthag vaṃśā prakīrtitāḥ
analyzed: iti dākṣāyiṇīnām te pṛthak prakīrtitāḥ
deva asura manuṣya ādyāḥ lokāḥ yatra cara acarāḥ
